title: Where's My Water? 2
description:
Get ready to join Swampy, Allie, and Cranky on their NEXT exciting adventure!
 
The sequel to the most addicting physics-based puzzler from Disney has finally arrived. Where‚Äôs My Water? 2 launches with three brand new locations including the Sewer, the Soap Factory, the Beach. Best of all, the puzzles are all free! Cut through dirt, and guide fresh water, purple water, and steam to help Swampy and his friends!
 
Key Features:
‚Ä¢ Play 100+ levels and challenges with a brand new look in the Gator universe featuring Swampy, Allie, Cranky, and Mystery Duck!
‚Ä¢ Introducing ‚ÄòChallenge Modes‚Äô to replay the levels in explosive new ways! 
‚Ä¢ Dig as fast as you can and get as many duckies as possible in ‚ÄòDuck Rush‚Äô levels!
‚Ä¢ ‚ÄòTri-ducking‚Äô is now faster, better and more fun with boosts, such as Vacuum, Dropper, and Absorber! Small fees may be required for these additional boosts.
‚Ä¢ Experience fun mechanics that are uniquely designed for each character!
‚Ä¢ Complete achievements and earn special themed duckies such as gladiator-duckie, astronaut-duckie, hula-duckie, and many more!
‚Ä¢ Stuck on a level? Use hints to help you solve the puzzles!

Where‚Äôs My Water? is a multiple Game of the Year award-winning puzzle game. The Where's My... franchise has received hundreds of millions of downloads to date.

Before you download this app, please consider that this app includes advertising, some of which may be targeted to your interests. You may choose to control targeted advertising within our applications by using your mobile device settings (for example, by re-setting your device‚Äôs advertising identifier and/or opting out of interest based ads). 

‚Ä¢ In-app purchases that cost real money
‚Ä¢ The option to accept push notifications to let you know when we have exciting updates like new content
‚Ä¢ Location-based services
‚Ä¢ Advertising for some third parties, including the option to watch ads for rewards
‚Ä¢ As well as advertising for The Walt Disney Family of Companies

This app accesses your contact information to enable you to easily 
communicate with your contacts.

You can upload and save content from this app to your device.

Visit the official Where's My Water? 2 website ‚Äì https://lol.disney.com/games/wheres-my-water-2-app

Privacy Policy - https://privacy.thewaltdisneycompany.com/
Terms of Use - https://disneytermsofuse.com/
Your California Privacy Rights - https://privacy.thewaltdisneycompany.com/en/current-privacy-policy/your-california-privacy-rights/
Do Not Sell My Info - https://privacy.thewaltdisneycompany.com/en/dnsmi/
Children‚Äôs Online Privacy Policy - https://privacy.thewaltdisneycompany.com/en/for-parents/childrens-online-privacy-policy/

recentChanges: Minor bug fixes
comments: It is amazing, and super challenging, but now I can't play any further because I unlocked all traits to unlock the gate to get to the beach, that didn't work, so then I tried to buy it, but it's still not letting me, so I tried to restart my phone, and I come back, and it still doesn't work, Can you guys please fix this somehow?

The reason I give this game a 1 star rating is the fact that I can't exit the sewer section because the upside down challenge of each level crashes the app. I cannot gain enough ducks to brake the barrier open because of this bug. Also the level reset button also crashes the app. I had the game for a long time and decided to reinstall it on my new phone. I tried to uninstall and reinstall it but the same bug was still there. Fix it or I removing the game

Fix the gameplay. It is so hard to dig at a specific way without messing everything up and it is very annoying. The dirt next to the slidable blocks are also very hard to dig as it keeps thinking your adjusting the blocks. That becomes problematic in duck rush levels (especially steam). You have to watch 3 ads just to get to the next section, and some levels get very frustrating. Might be a bug, but I cannot access the cutscenes later on and don't even have music after the beach levels

The lock gate requires pay or watch three ads. Watched one ad, then had to wait 24hrs to come back. Then, would not let me play the second ad. Not sure why disney is ripping folks off...oh wait, it's disney. Be honest, if you want us to pay don't lie to us with a bait and switch.
The game crashes again and again. If any challenge level is going on it comes to a certain point and then the game crashes. Fix the problem... otherwise the game is good.

title: Water Drink Reminder
description:
Best of 2016 App, Top Trending App and Best Self-Improvement App selected by Google Play.

Water Drink Reminder reminds you to drink enough water. Proper hydration keeps your skin healthy and helps you lose weight.
Featured by Google Play! No.1 heath app over 30 countries, top 5 over 90 countries! The best water tracker app ever! Helps you stay hydrated.

GOOGLE PLAY AWARD: TOP DEVELOPER
The Water Drink Reminder now supports Google Fit

Do you drink enough water?
Do you always forget to drink water regularly?
Are you in good shape?
You need Water Drink Reminder - a water tracker app to help you develop good habits of water drinking!

This water tracker app reminds you to drink water every day to keep you hydrated.

Just enter your current weight, and Water Drink Reminder will help you determine how much water your body needs every day. Remember to update the app each time you drink a cup of water. Then the app will remind you when it's time for another drink. Hydration helper not only tracks what you drink, but also reminds you when it's time for another drink.

The benefits of drinking water:
* Stay in shape and keep fit; water is calorie free
* Clears up your skin
* Keeps your skin and nails healthy
* Helps prevent kidney stones
* Keeps you hydrated

Key Features include:
* Water tracker that will remind you when and how much water to drink throughout the day
* Customized cup and standard (oz) or metric (ml) units
* You can set your start and end time to drink water for each day
* Graph and logs of your schedule
* Syncs weight data with Google Fit.
* Syncs weight and drink water data with S Health.
* You can login through your Google account.
* You can backup and restore your drinking data through the water tracker.

In our day-to day life, drinking water regularly can be challenging, despite its numerous health benefits. This water tracker app makes it easier to stay hydrated. It may even help you lose weight and prevent certain illnesses.

Water Drink Reminder is a secure app. Please contact us if you have any security questions.

Water Drink Reminder Pro version: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.northpark.drinkwaterpro&referrer=utm_source%3DWater_Free

developerAddress: UNIT047/F, BRIGHT, WAY TOWER, NO.33 MONG KOK ROAD KOWLOON Hong Kong Box 957
recentChanges: * Bug fixes and performance improvements.
comments: I've always known that water was good for us but rarely did I drink water, never even thought much about it , until I became sick very dehydrated this is the 5th. Water app that I have installed on my phone and it works wonderfully. You can customize! the app, Notifications Work Great ! My health has improved 100% now that I drink the recommended amount of water üëç

I am finding that this app is great. It helps me drink more and on top of that, it makes me more cautious of what I am drinking now. It makes a huge impact when you are looking at what you are putting in tour body. A huge bonus is the reminder sound. Super funny. I am using the free version as of right now and I am finding that it runs very smoothly and not so many ads. If all continues well, I will be purchasing the pro version and will update my review then. Big shout out to the developers!!
Thanks so much for this app! It helps so much, but my only criticism of it is that it does not alarm long and loud enough. Other than that, good job!
Loved it. Simple and effective way to keep a track of water intake, against the recommended intake based on body weight..
Honestly a good app but the reminders while you are ahead of schedule don't work. I still get hourly reminders even though I'm ahead of schedule which is really annoying.

title: Water Reminder - Remind Drink Water
description:
Reminds you to drink water, a great application that take care of your health.
Let drink water remind you to drink water if you always forget it. The best healthcare application for you. And it's totally free.
If you're too busy to remember having to drink enough and regularly, don't worry, there's "drink water" to help you solve that problem.
Drink water reminder is an application with main function is to help us keep water tracker we need to replenish and water drinking reminder in time. Users only need to select a gender and enter a weight number, it will help you calculate how much water should you drink per day. You can also tracker water history, reach your daily goal to open the respective achievements, and many other useful functions, ... Water drinking reminder will help you build a good habit with healthy body.
* Main features :
- Easy to use, beautiful interface.
- Based on gender, weight will let you know how much water should drink a day.
- Human body graphics to drinking water tracker
- Diverse menu of nearly 20 different drinks.
- Can choose the amount of water each time.
- Smart reminder: time mode go to bed so you don't get drink water reminder.
- Water tracker by week, month and year in the chart
- Can adjust the amount of drinking water in the past.
- Can option interval time receive drink water reminder message
- Achievements to encourage you to accomplish your daily goal.
- Allows integration of data into health application.
With many benefits of drinking water such as weight loss, healthy skin, reduced fatigue and preventing many diseases, ... an drink water reminder application is extremely useful and necessary. So, "drink water" is like a companion to your health. Use now to your water tracker.
If you want to keep healthy, drink enough. Want to drink enough, install water drinking reminder ! If you feel this water drinking reminder application is useful, share it with your friends and family. Above all, we are excited and hope to receive your feedback or ideas for we can complete and develop this app in the next version.Any feedback please send to my email

summary: Reminds you to drink water, a great application that take care of your health.
comments: Love it . Love the UI . Its clean and minimal . The monochrome color option its well pleasing to the eye . Most importantly love the function on tap to fill the meter . It got me addicted to complete my daily water consumption. During this corona outbreak . Its really help me to focus on drinking more water . Thanks ! And keep up the good job !

It's a great app with no disturbing ads that make you wait 30 seconds just to log in a cup of water you just drank... It also let's you select the size of the cup and then edit the time or how much you drank later on in case you want to log 3 cups at once. The only issue I have with it is that the notifications sometimes are missed when you swipe them away too many times in a row. Personally I would also like to be able to select a theme or customise the app a little more, otherwise it's great!!

Would be great if it adjusts the time automatically when we drink water before or after the scheduled time. Eg: you drank water at 11AM and you recorded it, but the actual time scheduled is for 11:30 AM and the app reminds you at 11:30 AM even though you drank water just 30 minutes back. The app could instead reschedule the time for.. let's say, 12:30 or 12:45 maybe. Just a suggestion üòä

I like this app; it is a simple and helpful way to keep track of water intake and daily goals. However, I have a few suggestions which would make it fantastic: 1. a widget to click on when you drink water. 2. when you click on the notification cup, to have an option for it to record the water intake without it opening the app. 3. Please give the option to remove the schedule optimizer. I would prefer to keep the reminders at the times I specify, instead of it changing. Otherwise great app!

This app is really simple, intuitive and has a friendly interface, I like the little tips about how to drink water appropriately. However, I have a slight suggestion for the developer, you can try and reduce the size of the water drop Icon a bit, and space things out slightly, add a bit more space between the tip, the counter and the reminder sections to reduce visual cluttering, and so, reduce confusion to the eyes and make it feel even more intuitive.

title: Plant Nanny¬≤ - Your Adorable Water Reminder
description:
üéâ Google Play Best App of 2019 
Google Play in countries around the world, from Taiwan, to Hong Kong, Thailand, Indonesia, Italy, and Spain, featured the app on its list of Best Apps of 2019.

üíöThe Cutest Hydration App üíö

Water is essential for life, but drinking enough of it is also one of the easiest things to neglect. Plant Nanny¬≤ keeps track of how much water you drink -- each glass also waters the app‚Äôs plants so you can both thrive! Every day you can collect and take care of little plants to get hydrated and grow together!

What‚Äôs so good about drinking water?
Do you want a healthier body and a happier, more stress-free life? Are you looking to improve constipation, urethritis, or other common health conditionsÔºü

‚úÖ About 70% of our body is composed of water, so how our body feels depends a lot on how much water we drink. Starting with just a single glass of water, you can begin to change your entire water consumption habits and effectively improve your health, lose weight, and reduce bodily fatigue and illnesses.

‚úÖ  Plant Nanny¬≤ will provide you with a customized plan using simple charts and interfaces so you can get a solid grasp on your personal water consumption. Collect cute plants and improve the way your body looks and feels before you know it! These little plants will boost your spirits, improve your health, and help you cultivate good habits for drinking water!

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
‚óà Customize the way you manage your water consumption goals ‚óà
----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
ÔºäSuggestions for appropriate amounts based on individual body data and exercise habits
ÔºäAutomated reminders when it‚Äôs time to drink more water to help you truly establish the habit of regularly drinking water
ÔºäCustomize the volume of your water cup and easily set the appropriate units for each glass in either milliliters or ounces
ÔºäRewards for regular use and small missions encourage you to stay motivated and reach your own water consumption goals

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
‚óà Simple charts and interfaces at a glance ‚óà
----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
ÔºäGraphics that progressively track your daily water intake
ÔºäTrack your water consumption history and quickly view daily, weekly, and monthly trends
ÔºäSimple design and user-friendly interface, so you can easily build good habits
ÔºäOptimized for screens of all sizes for use on multiple devices

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
‚óà A variety of adorable and lively plants ‚óà
----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
ÔºäEach glass of water you drink also waters the plants, so you can grow and thrive together!
ÔºäAll kinds of special pots and containers. Develop your own cute plant family!
ÔºäUnlock and collect a variety of different plants, and even interact with mysterious new creatures!

‚ñºAny questions or suggestions?
You can go to Plant Nanny¬≤ > Menu > Settings > FAQ to quickly search for a solution.
If you‚Äôre still unable to find an answer to your question, tap the envelope icon in the top right corner to contact our ‚ÄúGarden Assistant‚Äù (customer service). :)

‚ñºFeel free to reach out to our support team with any suggestions
Find us on Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/plantnannyapp/ 
or on Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/plantnanny_us/ 

Privacy Policy and Terms of Service: http://fourdesire.com/terms

developerAddress: 1F, No. 4, Lane 113, Sec. 3, Chengde Rd., Datong Dist., Taipei City 103, Taiwan
recentChanges:
‚ñ†v2.0
Winter Hydration: Drink More Water!
- 7 brand new plants: potato, pepper... and more! Here to help you stay hydrated

‚ñ†v1.6.3

comments: It is refreshing (pun intended) to return to this app years after I first downloaded it (2014 or 2015). However, while the graphics are immensely better, they cause lots of lag and slow down my phone; I'd love if I can disable the animations. Also, I miss the greater number of cup sizes (now there are only 4, albeit customizable). Still, the plants are cuter than ever. The advertisements are not too invasive. It still serves as a nice reminder to stay hydrated. It does its job beautifully! ‚ù§üå±
I love how the app sends push notifications and encouraged me to drink the water throughout the day. The plants are really cute and motivate me to drink water because i don't want them to dry up.

I struggle drinking enough water so I was looking for an app to help me. I originally thought of something simple like a regular reminder/alarm (similar to what I have seen a few times in Twitch chats). Then I found this app! It's more than I wanted (literally)! I want to drink to keep my plants happy. The plants are very adorable, too! Love the art and the small bits of information. Simple but fun! You can also enjoy it without any microtransactions which is a huge bonus for a mobile app.
The original was better, quicker and easier to use, and felt more customizable with regards to pots and plant names

Plant Nanny is a beautifully stylistic water intake tracking app with charm found nowhere else. It is actively updated with new plants and other implements that continuously grow the game aspect and keep you using the app. I believe it would benefit to be able to view all your individual plants, most likely sorted by what plant they are. You are able to give a plant their own special name and pot but once they're in the greenhouse it becomes hard to track them even when you photograph them.

title: Water Drink Reminder - Hydration Tracker
description:
Water Drink Reminder helps you track your daily water intake. The hydration app is essentially a smart water reminder. It helps you develop a healthy habit of drinking water daily.

Maintaining water balance with the daily water tracker is easy. Just input your weight and height details as prompted. The water app will then specify your optimal daily amount of water. Thence, you will receive push notifications from the hydration app to remind you to drink water. Start using the Water Drink Reminder today and see how you reach your hydration goals.

Get the free water drinking app now and improve your health through proper hydration.

Key Features:
üíß Water alarm: reminds you to drink a specified amount of water during the day.
üíß Water counter: tracks your daily water intake.
üíß History: view graphs of your logged daily, weekly, and monthly water intake.
üíß Capacity customization: set amount to drink at a time.
üíß Unit selection: choose standard (fl oz) or metric (ml) units.
üíß Schedule notifications: choose when to receive the drink water notifications.
üíß Sleep time: set your sleep time to receive notifications only after you wake up.
üíß Pregnancy and breastfeeding modes: drink water tracker will recommend the right amount of water.
üíß Achievements program: motivates you to drink water consistently.

Terms of use: https://telegra.ph/Terms-of-Service-05-10-2
Privacy policy: https://telegra.ph/Privacy-Policy-05-10-5

comments: I love this app. It reminds me to drink plenty of water, and it is very nice. You do not need to buy premium,as basic works wonderful! Very satisfied with this app. üòÄ
I'm not good at drinking water and this app makes sure I dont get migraines from being dehydrated. I would definitely recommend this app.

:) I like it I just dont like how it's being refilled and I wasnt able to tell when I pressed on drink soda if it did because it didnt do the same as the water and I pressed it so many times and it mest up my flow and I dont know how to delete what I mest up :/
I've always have struggled with drinking enough water, but this app really helped me get into better habits. Totally recommend!

the app is really great. I really loved the design and cute illustrations. The achievement badge is a great idea too. I think it just needs some improvement in terms of user experience. To record water drinking, i have to click 3 buttons whereas in other apps i can do it in one. I think they can also improve more in displaying statistics. Maybe showing the streak in a week could be nice aside from the bar graphs. But overall i think this app has a lot of potential.

title: Drink Water Reminder - Hydration and Water Tracker
description:
Drink Water Reminder - Hydration and Water Tracker is an optimal water drinking reminder, which will help you keep fit and stay hydrated every day while improving your water diet and providing health benefits. Drink water app will track daily water intake using a single tap water logging. It prevents dehydration by reminding you when you forget to drink water, so you never get thirsty. Would you like to experience a natural H2O body cleanse and have a healthy skin and healthy nails in a natural way, while getting free kidney stone prevention and diabetes prevention? 

Drink Water Reminder - Hydration and Water Tracker features:

üì± Water Calculator ‚Äì Automatically calculates your recommended daily water intake based on your gender and weight. This is a starting point in your clear water diet and it will provide you with healthy nails and healthy skin. Stay hydrated and keep fit!

üîî Water drinking reminder ‚Äì Water reminder app will remind you to drink water during the day at desired intervals so you never get thirsty and experience dehydration. Drink water app reminder is fully customizable. It will not disturb you when sleeping.

üíß Water tracker ‚Äì Log daily water intake by using our single tap water logging system to track every single H2O drinking session and reach the hydration goal determined by water calculator. Keep your healthy nails and healthy skin even healthier.

üìà Statistics ‚Äì Drink Water Reminder app keeps track of your daily water intake, daily goal progress, and long-term statistics. See how this habit improves your health over time with this powerful body cleanse method which provides diabetes prevention and kidney stone prevention.

üèÜ Achievements ‚Äì Keep fit and get health benefits and enjoy the drink water app progress even more by checking how your avatar level goes up while regularly using water drinking reminder and achieving H2O milestones in a playful manner.

‚öôÔ∏è Customizable units ‚Äì Choose between imperial (fl oz) and metric (ml) units for water logging.

Dehydration is a deficit of total body water with an accompanying disruption of metabolic processes. It can cause physical and mental deterioration and speed up kidney stone formation as well as it can increase the risk for diabetes. Never get thirsty and Stay hydrated by using water calculator. Have a natural body cleanse by drinking more water at regular intervals during the day. Healthy skin and healthy nails are extra. Keep fit and make this journey easier using our water logging system. Drink Water Reminder - Hydration and Water Tracker is the best drink water app that supports your water diet and helps you speed up metabolism. It is a state of the art, pretty looking and easy to use water drinking reminder.

The health benefits of drinking more water:
* Stay in shape and keep fit; clean water diet is calorie free
* Helps you speed up metabolism
* Ensures healthy nails and clean, healthy skin
* Helps in kidney stone prevention
* Useful for diabetes prevention
* Activates full H2O body cleanse
* Lets you stay hydrated and prevent dehydration
* Provides general health benefits

Do not wait to be thirsty before you get some H2O, since thirst is a signal that your body is in dehydration already. In order to reap maximal health benefits and ensure optimal kidney stone prevention and diabetes prevention, you should use Drink Water Reminder regularly and never let yourself be thirsty.

Use Drink Water Reminder - Hydration and Water Tracker every day for water logging and witness a full body cleanse over the first month. If you are satisfied with the health benefits of our water drinking reminder, please stay hydrated with this water diet and let us know, in the reviews, how you like our drink water app.

comments: Did all I wanted...timely alarms and logs daily use. No unnecessary ads or popups. Thanks for a good app that suits my needsüëç

I really love the fact that we can set up a permanent notification! The only problem is that I can't seem to add the quantity without logging in to my phone or the app, I see the options like 500/250ml but when I click on it, doesnt add it to the tracker, I think it is supposed to otherwise I dont see why the buttons would be there but unless Im already logged into my phone and tap on it, it then opens up the app and updates the quantity. It would be great if I could keep adding w/o logging in.

Regularly drinking 3.5 to 5 litres of water and was using HyC App. Sometimes reminder didn't work & was using past 5 years. Finally searched few of them, installed n checked for 2 to 3 days & uninstalled. Like this app and sincerely recommend others in using this simple app. When too many things get involved, it becomes difficult as well as messy. Thanks to the developer for making it a simple app.

This app is really amazing because it helps me track the amount of water I take in per day. Thank you for this, hope to see some changes like personalizing a profile and having daily challenges that can be shared amongst friends! Thanks again!

This app is so cool. I'm really a dehydrating person and this app reminds me to drink and I so wanting to hit the goal of the day so I started to drink more than usual. And my skin just got better by only drinking water than taking supplements or using skincare products!

comments: Super useful!! I started to drink more daily water and I feel absolutely better.. Amazing app. It's not so much the app but it's the thought that you should drink water or the little cute guy there will look sad. However, I totally recommend!!
Very customizable even at the free level, and I like that you can look back at how much you drank on previous days.

I am really loving the app, it has helped me drink more water. I also really liken the little kettle bell to click on saying I've done a workout. The only thing I would like to say is that sometimes I have more then one exercise in a day and there is no way to add the extra exercise. So then it says that I've drank too much.

This app is grate it is effective and is not annoying.but on my 3 day using it.it stops giving me notifications I tried resetting my phone ,shutting it down and changing things in the settings but nothing seames to be working.
My daughter recommended this app because I wasn't drinking enough water, now I am drinking water more, and realizing it is very refreshing.

title: Where's My Water?
description:
Get the GAME OF THE YEAR award-winning puzzler!

Help Swampy by guiding water to his broken shower. Each level is a challenging physics-based puzzle with amazing life-like mechanics. Cut through dirt to guide fresh water, dirty water, toxic water, steam, and ooze through increasingly challenging scenarios! Every drop counts!
‚Ä¢	Original Stories & Characters ‚Äì Play through 4 unique stories featuring Swampy, Allie, Cranky and Mystery Duck. That‚Äôs over 500 amazing puzzles!
‚Ä¢	Innovative Mechanic ‚Äì See water in various forms and use your creativity to solve the puzzles ‚Äì totally stimulating! 
‚Ä¢	Collectibles, Challenges, and Bonus Levels ‚Äì Collect special items uniquely designed for each character and complete cool challenges to unlock bonus levels! ‚ÄúTri-Duck‚Äù each level for ultimate bragging rights!

SWAMPY‚ÄôS STORY 
Swampy the Alligator lives in the sewers under the city. He‚Äôs a little different from the other alligators ‚Äì he‚Äôs curious, friendly, and loves taking a nice long shower after a hard day at work. But there‚Äôs trouble with the pipes and Swampy needs your help getting water to his shower! 

ALLIE‚ÄôS STORY
Allie is the sewer's most creative alligator. Her quirky spirit and artistic talents made her a star. Now, the gators have crafted a one-of-a-kind steam-powered musical instrument, and can't wait to hear her play it! Help Allie get the steam she needs and enjoy her take on classic Disney tunes.

CRANKY‚ÄôS STORY 
Cranky, a real gator‚Äôs gator, has a big appetite and will eat anything, from tires to old fish bones. But he refuses to eat his greens! Use the dirty purple water to clear the algae on Cranky‚Äôs plate so he can gobble up his ‚Äúfood‚Äù. 

MYSTERY DUCK 
Catch this fancy teleporting Mystery Duck in this special chapter and hint hint - timing is everything! Find all kinds of surprises including the biggest duck ever, MegaDuck and cute little Ducklings! 

Some stories may require a small additional price but try the FREE levels today!

Before you download this experience, please consider that this app contains social media links to connect with others, in-app purchases that cost real money, as well as advertising for The Walt Disney Family of Companies and some third parties. In App Purchases from $0.99-$4.99

Visit the official Where's My Water? website ‚Äì http://lol.disney.com/games/wheres-my-water-app

Privacy Policy - https://privacy.thewaltdisneycompany.com/
Terms of Use - https://disneytermsofuse.com/
Your California Privacy Rights - https://privacy.thewaltdisneycompany.com/en/current-privacy-policy/your-california-privacy-rights/
Do Not Sell My Info - https://privacy.thewaltdisneycompany.com/en/dnsmi/
Children‚Äôs Online Privacy Policy - https://privacy.thewaltdisneycompany.com/en/for-parents/childrens-online-privacy-policy/

comments: My additional chapters are gone,. I bought this and the second game years ago, and all the additional purchases were made. but now they're gone with no way to restore, Disney or Google owe me a refund or restore them.
I truly enjoy playing this game. It encourages the mind to grow and think through situations in a really fun way.

Honestly my favorite game. It's fun and challenging, well built, and a good value. My whole family plays it.
Most exceptional game ever. I've purchased this game 3 times on multiple devices.

comments: This app is perfectly simple to track your water intake without all the bells and whistles. Exactly what I was looking for! Ads are at the bottom and don't pop up on you. You can adjust goals for what you should be drinking, based on weight, or a set an amount to work up to. You can turn reminders on and off, and add earlier intake if you forgot to log it in. And the changing emoji faces based on your progress makes it fun!

I never thought I would be getting an app to track my water intake. I was going to make an excel sheet and then tried tracking it as part of fat secret's food tracker. But it was too cumbersome and I wanted to make it into a competition with myself. You can set alarms if you need assistance reminding yourself to drink up. I don't care about the alarms right now, but I like tracking how many days I smashed my goals. üòÅ It's simple and effective so I can focus on other priorities.

Simple, straightforward, does what it's meant to do. Easy to use. Only complaint is that the Streak doesn't update when you put in an entry for a previous day. Several times I've forgotten to put in my last water input of the day until the following morning.. The Intake Chart updates, but the Streak does not. Would be nice if that was fixed, just for the motivational boost. :)

This is a good app the only thing I wish that it had would be half measurements for the amount. And more time selection for reminders would be helpful. I think two hours is too soon for as much as I drink at a time. I think you need to add a two-and-a-half-hour or 3 hour reminder.

I appreciate this app for its simplicity. You don't have to specify a cup size that persists and that you have to select from. You put in the amount of water you drank, and that's all. It tracks it for you, and if you fall behind its recommended pace, the notifications pick up. Other tracking apps try to do far too much and can be so frustrating to work around, especially if you JUST want to track water. This app does exactly what I downloaded it to do and I appreciate that!

title: Flow Water Fountain 3D Puzzle
description:
Flow Water Fountain is a puzzle game of increasing difficulty in which each level is a challenging game of logic and intelligence that will hook you.

Train your mind, solve the different puzzles by making the water flow from its origin to the color fountains forming different waterfalls. Create water jets, water cascades, move the different blocks and stones, channels and pipes through the 3D board and get the water of each color to flow and find the way to your destination fountain.

Flow Water Fountain contains 450 levels with increasing difficulty divided into several packs: Basic, Pools, Easy, Hard, Mix, Pools 6x6, Master, Genius and Maniac.

The game is suitable for kids, adults, fans of block puzzles and jigsaws, plumber games to train your brain and logic.

Characteristics:
- 300 free puzles
- Without time limit.
- Boards of different sizes and difficulty.

Download it now and start having fun!

recentChanges: Bugs fixed
comments: Graphics good, play is easy, it doesn't take much skill to play if you're logical minded. However, they only let you go so far before you have to pay to play. Not cool! If I want to pay I'll go buy an Xbox, etc. Gave it a 3 star for the graphics. Still, it buggy. You have to play with it a little, or restart to get it to work out of the bug. Uninstalling!!!

I love the sound of running water. So being able to play a puzzle like this is fun for me. So far the only issue I've had is that the tracking is not the best and you have to try more than once to drop a tile in place. Not a big issue since you are free to move tiles as often as needed. It really is a 3D water puzzle. Unless I missed it somewhere, being able to get a hint about where to place a tile would be nice. Most of us are not going to remember an entire solution in one go.

Great little puzzle game. Many of the puzzles are relatively easy, some (in the basic free version), not so much. Still working on most of the paid add-on sets. Wish they had a build and share your own fountains. Definitely worth 5 stars.

The puzzles aren't that interesting. I don't want super difficulty, but most of the levels here take you longer to move the pieces than to figure out the solution. The way the pieces work and the 3D nature of the levels feels like there's scope for really interesting challenges but I played 100 or so levels and never got to them if they do exist. It's a pity because as an app it's quite nice, the ads aren't terrible, and it loads quickly.

This game has 50 puzzles on each level. There are 6 free levels (with varying difficulty) to choose from. Some levels are unlocked by watching ads. There are 3 advanced levels that require purchase from the store. Graphics are clear and crisp. Seeing the water pass through the maze once the puzzle is complete is extremely satisfying! The controls are pretty straightforward, select and drag. The player has the option to rotate the puzzle to see from all angles. Overall, great puzzle game!

title: Happy Glass
description:
The glass is sad because it's empty. Your job is to draw a line to make the glass filled up with liquid and smile again!

Try to find the best way to complete each level. You can come up with your own solution so be creative and don't be afraid to think out of the box!
Some levels might look easy but let's see if you can actually get the 3 stars.

features :
* dynamic mechanism. Draw lines freely to complete levels!
* Simple, smart and fun puzzles but can be challenging too
* Lots of levels with more coming soon!
* Fun and relaxing theme that will make you stay for quite some time

recentChanges: Minor Bug Fixes
comments: I never write reviews like ever. However this game was such a disappointment I needed to. I used to have this game a while back and I loved it. Now however this game is so horribly ruined by ads it is completely unplayable. The ads are so long that it is actually faster to leave the application close it and re launch it than it is to just watch the ad. Was a great game that is now horrible DO NOT DOWNLOAD! save your self some time. And you can't even buy it once to make it ad free horrible game.

I like it but there's too many Ads.. And when the Ad will open, there is no back button where I can go back to play the game. So annoying. Please don't force people to download the games on the Ad even if we don't like it. Looks like other people will he forcee to download it just so we can go back to the game.

ADS. The game itself is okay, a little ditzy, but the sheer number of ads will test your patience. Ads when you load a level, ads when you complete a level, ads between the "you win" screen and the "next level" screen, ads when you open the next level, ads when the janky controls lead to you retrying a level... You get the idea.

A great concept for a game but UNPLAYABLE due to the absolutely obscene number of ads. I am not exaggerating when I say there is 30 sec of ads for every 10 sec of gameplay. I get that ad revenue pays for games but no game should have this ratio of gameplay to ads. I am floored by this. Fix you game

There are so many adds after every 2 levels .Just spoil the whole game ; I understand that adds are there but so......many adds . The game is fantastic but due to these 100 of adds just make the game worst game I downloaded üò°üò°. Also there are adds when restart the game and to claim prize .

title: Water Pipes
description:
Water Pipes is the one of the best puzzle games in the market and without a doubt the best pipe connection game.
All you need to do is to rotate pipes, connect them and make a working pipeline.
Touch the pipes to turn them.
Construct a water path from valve to container.
Solve puzzles fast and get more experience points.
You can always use hints if you have got stuck in some level.
Improve your experience level and unlock new fantastic packages with unique gameplay.

Features:
* 2000+ fantastic levels
* 4 game packs with unique gameplay
* Nice graphics and sounds
* Daily challenges
* Daily rewards
* Hint system

So what are you waiting for?Try your plumber skills in making water pipeline.  Download this game for Free and became the best pipeline maker in the world!

title: Drink Water Reminder & Water Tracker - Hydro Coach

2 Million+ people worldwide use Hydro Coach as their Drink Water Reminder app every day. It's a free Water Tracker that reminds you to drink water and even syncs your water intake with Fitbit, Samsung Health and Google Fit.

recentChanges: Thanks for staying hydrated with Hydro Coach. Keep up drinking and share the app with your friends. üíô
comments: Only my first day using the app but so far I love it. I normally drink a lot of water but never know exactly how much or what is right for my body. I love with a simple 4 question quiz the app told me how much water I should be drinking and how often. I also appreciate the reminder interval you can set because I do get some busy days where I'm constantly on the go and forget to stay hydrated. You can choose from a variety of beverages too. This is all just from the free parts of the app.

Pop up ad after every use, then a pop up explaining why it has to have ads. Jesus, irritating. You're not even a game, you're a damn app for keeping track of fluid intake! And it takes up to 30 seconds for the app to load, a water drinking app with like nothing in it, while my Mahjong game with hundreds of levels loads in literally 1 second. Literally. One second.

I love the fact that this app is totally customizable - you can choose how much water, how often, etc. If you're not sure how much water you're supposed to be drinking, you just answer the perameter questions and it calculates for you, adjusting even for things like exercise and age! Very nice app - I'm glad I chose this over the other ones that I was considering.

Extremely useful app, gave me exactly what I wanted, I could custom the amount of fluid that I drink each time, as well as the total amount of fluid intake through the day. Very nice information about why you need to drink water also keeps changing everyday, and which really does make you feel like drinking water!

Almost every time I enter my water intake it plays a very loud advertisement! Completely unacceptable especially when I'm at work in a quiet office. Ads are fine, videos with sound are not. Cannot use this app anymore until this is changed. UPDATE: I opened the app today after a year of not using it and got blasted with a loud ad featuring Danny DeVito. APP DELETED

title: Uphill Rush Water Park Racing
description:
Get ready for some extreme waterslide action in the world‚Äôs craziest water park racing simulator! 

üåä NOW WITH A MULTIPLAYER MODE! üåä Try it for free today!

How long can you surf while you perform crazy stunts, flips, and slide through everything in your path?

Master your surfing skills and bounce through roller coaster style corkscrews, loops, and more! Will you dare to try some seriously insane racing tracks? This is more than just fun in the sun in an amusement park. Do you have the skills to make it to the finish line and not wipe out? 
Test yourself with an epic and thrilling ride now!

TAKE IT TO THE MAX! Take the fun to another level! You'll flip over our most thrilling water slide game when you choose from tons of rad ‚Äúboards‚Äù like bathtubs, sharks, or jet skis, each with their own unique specs.

title: Water Reminder - drink water on time daily
description:
Water Drink Reminder helps you to drink water if you always forget it. The best healthcare application for you and it's totally free.
Proper hydration keeps your skin healthy and helps you lose weight.
Water Reminder is not only water drinking reminder  but also a water tracker app that can help you develop a good habit to drink water on time daily and ensure daily regular and enough water intake! 

This daily hydration reminder is the app which helps us to track the quantity of water we drink and remind us to drink water in right time, use water drinking reminder app to save the body in short supply and drink water after workout, meditation or yoga.

We all know that water is essential to our health, get Drink Water Reminder and water tracker, start to drink water and record your water intake!

People are always too busy to drink water, or we only drink water when we feel thirsty, that‚Äôs too late if so, water plays a very important role in our body, it transports nutrients and oxygen into cells, regulates body temperature, helps with metabolism and so on, drinking enough water can help us lose weight, look younger with healthier skin, less likely to get sick, helps in digestion and constipation, relieves fatigue, have a good mood, reduce the risk of cancer and more.

To majority of us, we don‚Äôt know exactly how much water we drink, is that quantity suitable for us? this daily water app helps us to track the quantity of water we drink and remind us to drink water in right time.

Water reminder is very easy to use, just select your gender and enter your current weight, and Water Drink Reminder will help you determine how much water your body needs every day, You can also tracker water history, reach your daily goal to open the respective achievements, and many other useful functions
Remember to update the app each time you drink a cup of water. Then the app will remind you when it's time for another drink. Hydration helper not only tracks what you drink, but also reminds you when it's time for another drink.


* Key Features include:

- Easy to use, beautiful interface.
- Tracker water history
- Based on gender, weight will let you know how much water should drink a day.
- Diverse menu of nearly 20 different drinks.
- Can adjust the amount of drinking water in the past.
- Smart reminder: time mode go to bed so you don't get drink water reminder.

* The benefits of drinking water:

Keeps your skin and nails healthy
Helps prevent kidney stones
Regulates body temperature
Prevents Hangovers
Helps maintain blood pressure

If you want to keep healthy, drink enough. Want to drink enough, install water drinking reminder ! If you feel this water drinking reminder application is useful, share it with your friends and family.

Download Drink water reminder right now!

recentChanges:
Fix some bugs
Fix set remider function
comments: I often forget to drink water, yet alone enough water. The out the blue drink water sound keeps me on track. It keeps reminding me until I have reached my goal for the day. Once the goal has been met, it asks if you want to continue to be alerted. That turn off feature is great. Love it

Could be great but some things don't make sense. The smallest amount to customize cup size is 200 fl oz? When I click on the reminder it auto logs water intake but I can't edit the amount. The app doesn't divide the calculated daily water amount by the number of reminders set for the day and defaults to 7 oz. which leaves me short. This wouldn't be such a problem if editing options were better. Im sorry I purchased the pro version.
Smooth app. Giving 2 stars until there's a way to delete customized drinking measurements. If there is a way, it's not very intuitive. 5 stars once I get this figured out.

Does it have to be so invasive? Pop up notification cannot be removed whatever you do. I want to be in control of what my phone does. I am into drinking proper amount of water every day, but I hate to be distracted with this pop up every time. Mute notifications will suffice for these purposes. I regret I paid for the app because it's intolerable. Free version had ads with volume so every X minutes you received that madness which was the reason I switched to paid version. Fix your app!
It's o.k. Animation is cute and it's easy to set, but there is no audible reminder. I don't realize the reminder is there unless I look at the phone. I wish it had a tone I can hear to remind me.

title: Drink Water app: water tracker & drinking reminder
description:
"Drink Water app: water tracker & drinking reminder" tracks your daily water intake and reminds you when it's time to drink water to ensure proper hydration levels. This daily water reminder helps you develop healthy habits via drinking alarms and many other useful features. All for completely free!

Developing your healthy hydration habit will be easier than ever before with our free water app.

You can use this water tracker for weight loss, but there are many more advantages...
Drink more water and:
üíß Stick to your diet
üíß Detox your body
üíß Clear up your skin
üíß Fill up on much-needed minerals and lower stress
üíß Avoid bladder infections
üíß Boost energy
üíß Prevent kidney stones
üíß Increases brain power

Why use "Drink Water app: water tracker & drink water reminder"?
üõë ALL FOR COMPLETELY FREE!
Unlike our competitors, this drink water tracker offers you a variety of reminders, notifications and much more for free. Take advantage of unlimited features without any charge. Doesn't matter if you need water alarm or water calculator, you'll find everything in this app. See below what you can get!

üõë CREATE A PERSONAL HYDRATION GOAL
A water calculator in this hydration app will automatically calculate your water intake goal on the basis of your weight, gender, and activity. Your calculated target will also take into account whether you are breastfeeding or pregnant. You can even add other additional lifestyle details to further tailor your water balance target. This daily water reminder is just right for you. 

üõë PREDEFINED AND CUSTOM CUPS
Quickly add a drink using our predefined collection, or create your own customizable cup using a wide range of colors and unique volumes.
The hydration app provides information about the hydration level for different types of drinks. This means that there are different hydration levels for the most popular drinks: aqua, tea, coffee, juice, milk, beer, wine, and strong alcohol.
Choose preferred units: imperial (oz) or metric (ml/dl/cl).

üõë SMART AND CUSTOM REMINDERS
Set your bedtime and rest well without being disturbed by drink water notifications.
Choose your alarm interval to decide how often the app will remind you to drink, or manually set specific dates and time to drink water.
Select your preferred alert mode in just a couple of taps; from silent, through vibration only, to automatic mode. In this water drinking app, you can also snooze alerts easily whenever you need to. 

üõë DETAILED MOTIVATIONAL STATISTICS
Our water drinking reminder allows you to see your daily/weekly/yearly liquid consumption, and drinking progress with hydration graphs and water intake log.
Review your current and longest streaks, stay motivated, and develop an effective water drinking habit!

üõë ADD INFORMATION ABOUT THE WEATHER
Did you know that the weather and climate can affect your hydration needs? You can add this information to make your daily target even more accurate. Unlike other apps, our drink tracker and alarm lets you do it for free!

üõë CUTE OCTOPUS
Drink more water and make the cute octopus happy. The more dehydrated you are, the more thirsty the octopus becomes. Your cute companion will reflect the changes in your hydration levels. Whenever you need a drink, make sure your octopus gets one too!

A better water drinking habit means a better, healthier life! This water drinking app is everything you need to stay healthy.

If you see anything we can improve in our water drinking reminder, please let us know! New reviews and support emails are really helpful for making this free water app better and smarter! Contact us at support@listonic.com :)

May the aqua be with you!

comments: I equally love and hate the app! It's awesome with reminders and consistent always (even when u dont wanna üôÑ lol) I love the little characters as well as the differnt ways you can keep track of your beverages. I reccomend this app for anyone like myself that really struggles to remeber to drink water daily! I always end up dehydrated and I'd love to see them modify it with a "sick" option for colds flus and stomach bugs! As well as even a snack reminder for those of us that are so busy !

I like the app for the tracking options which include coffee, tea, soda, and others in addition to water. I also like being reminded to drink. But I am disappointed that I paid for the ad-free version for life, and yet an ad will still pop up periodically. I hope an update will fix that.

This app has potential to be an intuitive drinking reminder. But I personally found some bugs. (1) I subscribe for one month because I do like the app, but the ads keep appearing. (2) The hamburger menu most of the time won't work after I swipe up from the main screen to see my summary. (3) I installed this app on Galaxy M30s running Android 9.

This is a very good app that helps you to reach your daily water intake goals!! It is simple to use and the reminders throughout the day, keep you on course. Plus the little octupus graphic encourage s you to continue with your goal. Overall, great app that I will be recommending to others.

I really like this app! One reason why is because I have lost 10 pounds üòÅ I really really like this app and I'm going to continue this wonderful app. Oh! and also,this app dose notifi you when you need to drink your water.üòÜüòÉüòÅ‚ù§Ô∏è‚ù§Ô∏è‚ù§Ô∏è

title: WaterMinder - Water Tracker and Drink Reminder App
description:
WaterMinder is an award winning daily water reminder & tracker that allows you to view your hydration balance progress, calculate water goal, get motivated via reminders, achieve your daily hydration goals and win awards! Download now!

** Featured by The New Yorker, Women's Health, Glamour, Tech Crunch, Lifehacker, Gizmodo, Venture Beat, BGR, The Telegraph, Mashable, Venture Beat, Tech Crunch, Digital Trends and many more! **

‚ö†Ô∏è Dehydration can lead to serious health problems, lack of focus, headaches, fatigue, can even affect your mood!

Get help with WaterMinder, an easy and intuitive app to track your water intake and remind you to stay hydrated. Based on your body weight, activity, weather (or your own custom personal goal), WaterMinder will remind you to drink water to reach your daily hydration goals. By seeing current water fill visually and in percents you will instantly know how well you are hydrated!

‚≠ê Why should I stay hydrated? ‚≠ê

üíß Your muscles are 75% water
üíß Your brain ‚Äì 90% water
üíß Your blood ‚Äì it is 83% water
üíß Even your bones are 22% water!

‚ù§Ô∏è It stands to reason, therefore, that we need to drink water to live a healthily life. And most of us have received that advice from a very young age. We are told to drink to stay fit and keep healthy. Enjoy your water!

üì± Keeping track of your daily water intake needs and making sure your body is well hydrated is not an easy task in todays busy world. Let WaterMinder help you!

WaterMinder app helps you keep track of your water intake each day, and helps you make sure you drink enough. But what is enough and how does the app know how much you should drink? What is the daily Water Intake Goal?

The ultimate Water Reminder Main Features:

üíß Clean visual view of your current water fill, hydration level
üíß Simple, quick and easy to use water reminder interface (just tap on 1 icon and a menu opens with your options to log/track your water intake)
üíß Daily Water Intake Calculator
üíß Pre-defined cups for quick tracking
üíß Customize your cups, colors, icons, sizes
üíß Other drink types
üíß Create custom water reminders
üíß History and graph to see your hydration progress
üíß Earn achievements/awards by staying hydrated
üíß Widget for quicker water tracking
üíß US Oz, UK Oz and ML water units
üíß Free guide to drinking water


More details about our water reminder and tracker app features:

üíß Award winning water reminder and tracker - your body is two-thirds water, so it is important to stay hydrated and WaterMinder is the perfect tool for that!

üì± Water Intake Calculator - calculate your suggested daily water intake goal. WaterMinder asks your weight when calculating your daily Water Intake Goal, but it takes into account other factors too. This includes if you are pregnant or breast feeding. It also adjusts the calculation for the climate that you live in and how active your lifestyle is.

üìä Hydration Statistics - get insights on your water intake progress, view daily, weekly, monthly or yearly graphs to see how well you are doing.

‚è∞  Water Reminders - the default WaterMinder reminders run from 8am until 5pm, but this might not match with your lifestyle. You can edit the reminders so they are more suitable to your daily routine. You can change the default reminders, which are set at 1.5 hour intervals and add new reminders for any time of day that you want.

üèÜ Achievements - have fun while staying hydrated and unlock multiple achievements for tracking water!

‚öôÔ∏è Custom Cups - create custom cups based on your needs

‚ù§Ô∏è Stay Healthy - Your body is two-thirds water, so it is important to stay hydrated. You don‚Äôt have to just drink water, though. In fact, everything you drink contributes to your hydration levels to a greater or lesser degree. You even get water from the food you eat.


Stay healthy, and drink more water - hydrate yourself!

It helped me get into water routine and hydration! My skin is healthier. My mood is brighter. And my digestion is clear! All thnx to this app! Glad i found itüòä

title: Water Tracker - Hydrillo
description:
Do you drink enough?
It's high time to Drink Water.

Hydrillo is a simple, free and smart Water Tracker and Drink Water Reminder.
Get reminded to Drink Water and create a healthy habit.

DRINK GOAL:  
Our Water Tracker Hydrillo calculates your hydration needs based on your age, weight, lifestyle and even the climate you live in or just set a personal drink goal. 

WATER TRACKER:  
Track what you drink by choosing from existing drinks or create your very own drinks.

DRINK WATER REMINDER AND ALARM:  
Get a Drink Water Reminder every x hours or get reminded to refill your glass of water.

HEALTH BENEFITS OF DRINKING WATER:
‚óº Glowing, clear skin  
‚óº Stay in shape and loose weight. Drinking enough water is basis of every professional diet 
‚óº Stress relief  
‚óº Regulates body temperature  
‚óº Water can help against back pain  
‚óº Still tired eyes? Drink Water! 
‚óº Increase productivity  
‚óº Relieve muscle fatigue  
‚óº Headache relief  
‚óº Encourage metabolism  
‚óº Promote digestion. Combat constipation. Drink Water! 
‚óº Drink Water! Water increases your well-being! A sufficient and regular fluid intake is the material condition to reach maximum well being.

KEY FEATURES OF OUR FREE WATER TRACKER:
‚óº Calculate your personal drink goal in four easy steps or set your own drink goal
‚óº Daily Drink Water Reminder  
‚óº Track your water intake
‚óº Choose between US System (fl. oz) and Metric (L/ml) System.
‚óº Syncs your drinks with Fitbit and Google Fit
‚óº Keep perfect track of your water balance through a simply designed diary
‚óº See your drink history in your drink diary
‚óº Practical widgets provide clear information about your water intake
‚óº Get insights into your water drinking habits and water balance with weekly and monthly statistics
‚óº Choose a color for your Water Reminder light
‚óº Choose your favorite Water Reminder sound
‚óº Combat with your friends, workmates and family members by sharing your daily water intake. Start your own drink water challenge.
‚óº Still need extra motivation to keep on track with your water intake? Here you are. Earn over 50 achievements until reaching level 17. 

Upgrade to ADS:
‚òÖ No ads

Upgrade to PRO:
‚òÖ Unlimited diary
‚òÖ Advanced statistics
‚òÖ Hydration factor
‚òÖ Rapid intake
‚òÖ More widgets
‚òÖ Auto weather

Upgrade to VIP:
‚òÖ ALL PRO features + no ads

If you have wishes, great ideas or if you just need somebody to talk, just write us an email. We would love to hear from you! ‚úê hi@hydrillo.com

Tell your friends:
http://twitter.com/hydrilloapp
http://facebook.com/hydrillo
http://instagram.com/hydrillo_app

Please support us with a good rating on the Google Play Store.
Your feedback is important.
Thank you! 

Now it's time to fill your glass with water. ‚è∞ 

Stay hydrated with Hydrillo. Your Water Tracker & Drink Water Reminder.
Get reminded to Drink Water ‚Äì keep track of your water intake ‚Äì create a healthy habit - and improve your health and fitness.

title: Drink Water Reminder
description:
Water Drink Reminder reminds you to drink enough water. Proper hydration keeps your skin healthy and helps you lose weight.

Do you drink enough water?
Do you always forget to drink water regularly?
Are you in good shape?
You need Water Drink Reminder - a water tracker app to help you develop good habits of water drinking!

This water tracker app reminds you to drink water every day to keep you hydrated.

Just enter your current weight, and Water Drink Reminder will help you determine how much water your body needs every day. Remember to update the app each time you drink a cup of water. Then the app will remind you when it's time for another drink. Hydration helper not only tracks what you drink, but also reminds you when it's time for another drink.

The benefits of drinking water:
* Stay in shape and keep fit; water is calorie free
* Clears up your skin
* Keeps your skin and nails healthy
* Helps prevent kidney stones
* Keeps you hydrated

Key Features include:
* Water tracker that will remind you when and how much water to drink throughout the day
* Customized cup and standard (oz) or metric (ml) units
* You can set your start and end time to drink water for each day
* Graph and logs of your schedule
* Syncs weight data with Google Fit.
* Syncs weight and drink water data with S Health.
* You can login through your Google account.
* You can backup and restore your drinking data through the water tracker.

In our day-to day life, drinking water regularly can be challenging, despite its numerous health benefits. This water tracker app makes it easier to stay hydrated. It may even help you lose weight and prevent certain illnesses.

Water Drink Reminder is a secure app. Please contact us if you have any security questions.

title: Drink Water - Tracker Reminder & Alarm [No Ads]
description:
Water is the primary liquid of life and makes up approximately 60% of the human body.To prevent dehydration, experts have suggested that we drink between 2 and 3 litres of water per day.

The benefits of drinking water are huge: weight loss, better hair, higher energy level, headache relief, healthier organs,  improved skin,  and many more.

Features
* Smart reminder will help you drink water timely.
* Set your beginning and ending time of water drinking.
* Customized cup as per you requirements.
* Graph and log of your schedule.
* Plan drinking schedule and it will remind you when it‚Äôs time.

This water reminder app reminds you to drink water every day to keep you healthy and hydrated.

title: Water Garden Live Wallpaper
description:
A marvelous 3D live wallpaper that instantly reshapes your mobile screen into an incredibly beautiful, ultra-realistic water pond full of spiritual koi fish!


    Use finger gestures to create stunning, velvet smooth water ripples and water waves that are unbelievably true!
    Watch adorable koi fish happily exploring your pond! Feed or tease these naughty koi fish with your fingers to make them happier!
    Choose among a rich set of fantastic natural scenes, almost every pixel has been polished deliberately just for your amusement!
    A store full of magic items and advanced features makes it possible to personalize your water garden almost in any way you'd like.

     3 REASONS WHY WATER GARDEN IS SIMPLY THE BEST APP IN ITS CATEGORY.
‚úî Top-class water ripple effects at nearly no cost of extra power loss. Behind this is a blazing fast c++ engine designed purely for water simulation, built from scratch!
‚úî Koi fish bodies are made of true 3D models, that's the only way to build expressive koi animations and subtle koi motions.
‚úî High-definition graphics maintain high visual quality on both small displays like phones and large displays like TVs.

    No other water-related or koi-related products achieve all above three like we do, that's what makes Water Garden the best App in its category!

title: Water Slide 3D
description:
Feel and live through the excitement of riding on a realistic water slide in 3D water parks! Play the world's most hilarious WATER SLIDER today!

Control the speeds of the rides and be careful while making sharp turns at intersections of a massive waterslide in this realistic 3D racing game. Chase the adrenaline rush as you twist and tilt your way round tight corners, make loops and whizz through at lightning speeds. But watch out, the edges are steep and there are some little surprises and gold coins along the way.

Game Features:
- Ride the slide in 1st person view or 3rd person view
- 7 unique riders and 6 different rafts or tubes to choose from
- 40+ challenging levels in 3D cityscape, rain forests, snowy mountains and Egypt pyramids backgrounds
- VR mode (virtual reality) which supports Google Cardboard & etc.

title: Water & Gong - Relaxing sounds: sleep & meditation
description:
Special sounds of water accompanied by Gong Bath* or Tibetan bowls will make you live a fabulous emotional journey in a magical atmosphere.

The vibrations of the Gong or the Tibetan bowls will make you into a state of deep relaxation.
Relax and nirvana effect will be sure!

Ideal for relaxing, sleeping, meditation, concentration, or if you have problems with tinnitus (ear ringing).

You can choose only the ambient sounds, only the Gong/Tibetan bowls or the synergy of both.

And thanks to the timer, you do not have to worry about closing the app. When the time is set, the sounds will fade gently and the app closes by itself.

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

Four types of Gongs:

‚òÖ Gong and Tibetan Bowls
‚òÖ Crystal Bowls
‚òÖ Tibetan Bowls
‚òÖ Big Tibetan Bowls

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

Ten mystic scenarios of water sounds:

‚òÖ Rain in the forest clearing
‚òÖ Waves of the sea at sunset
‚òÖ Zen garden with singing birds and hypnotic drops of water after the storm
‚òÖ Waterfall in a paradisiac little lake in the tropical forest
‚òÖ Stream in the rainforest
‚òÖ Oriental bamboo fountain
‚òÖ Diving in the coral reef
‚òÖ Zen fountain
‚òÖ Pool in the welness center
‚òÖ Shishi Odoshi (Japanese fountain)

Go into your oasis of peace!

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

* What is a Gong Bath?

A gong bath is a relaxing and blissful experience. During a gong bath you are bathed in sound waves. The sounds that come out of the gongs are difficult for the human brain to follow, and you will most likely drift into a deep meditative state. The gong bath is very good at relieving pain, stress or dealing with personal issues, it tends to bring people to a blissful state that can often last for many days.

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

*** Usage notes ***

For a better experience, I recommend you the use of headphones or earphones to listen the relaxing sounds.
You can use the app in background and with other apps.


*** Notes on permissions ***

- Device ID & call information (read phone status and identity)
Used to stop sound on incoming call and to play again at the end of call.

- In-app purchases
Used in the purchase of the premium version.

- Prevent phone from sleeping
Used to keep alive the app when you turn off the screen or while using other apps.

- Full network access and view network connections
Used to verify the purchases and show ads.

title: My Water Balance
description:
"My Water" helps you drink water regularly. Calculate your daily water intake and get notifications!

Water is essential for life on our planet. Roughly 70 percent of the body is made of water. We require water for almost every function within our bodies, from flushing out toxins to digestion. Water is essential to good health, yet needs vary between individuals. This app can help ensure you drink enough fluids.

Application features:
* Water requirement calculator
* Reminders
* Units (Metric and fl oz)
* Statistics in graphs
* Motivational awards
* Useful tips about water

You may need to modify your total fluid intake depending on how active you are, the climate you live in, your health status, etc., the calculation is only recommendation.

The application supports Apple Watch and is integrated with Apple Health.

This is one of the first applications with support Apple Watch! Application integrated with Apple Health to get information about your body measurement to calculate your water intake.

This is not an issue culturally, as I embrace cultural diversity. However, at times I've found in programming/apps/software it seems to reflect lack of attention to detail.

title: Kropla - Drink Water Tracker and Reminder
descriptionHTML:
Drinking water is really essential to your health. But even if we try to drink enough water, we often miss to do that or forget how much we drink.

This water reminder is simple and easy to use, it reminds you to drink water through your day and assists to track your liquid intake.

Enter your weight and the app will recommend you amount of water you should drink daily. Set your start and end time to drink water and choose frequency of reminders. Update water amount every time you‚Äôve drink a glass of water to keep track your hydration.

Features:
‚Ä¢ Scheduled Day/Night mode
‚Ä¢ Track the daily water intake;
‚Ä¢ See how well you perform with pacer
‚Ä¢ Choose between different skins of tracker
‚Ä¢ Add glasses to favorites, set hydration factor, choose color;
‚Ä¢ Set the daily goal manually or it will be calculated automatically based on your weight;
‚Ä¢ Apply adjustments to your goal (weather, sport, pregnancy/breastfeeding, etc.)
‚Ä¢ Turn on the reminders, make them silent or turn completely off:
‚Ä¢‚Ä¢ Set the time when you wake up and go to sleep;
‚Ä¢‚Ä¢ Set reminders frequency;
‚Ä¢‚Ä¢ Set reminders to refill your favorite glass
‚Ä¢‚Ä¢ Create your custom reminders schedule
‚Ä¢ Pick the unit: imperial (fl oz, lb) or metric (ml, kg);
‚Ä¢ See your stats
‚Ä¢ See the history of water intake.
summary: Get reminders to drink water. Track your water intake. Be healthy!
recentChanges: Now you can see how many days in a row your goal was reached
comments: Exactly what I'm looking for, I've looked through over 20 water reminder apps and this one was the best one for me! It allows me to set my own reminders, edit the amount I want to drink daily, and edit the drink container sizes! I also like that I can change the background üòä The only even sort of complaint that I have is that I wish the icon for it was different, like a water drop or something.

Absolutely love this app! It's free but it only shows 1 ad a day. The interface is simple and clean and you even have the option to choose from 4 skins. It's super easy to add a record of drinking water too. Only request maybe is to add a widget to add water record so it's easier to record. Great work! üòä ‚ù§Ô∏è

Absolutely outstanding. All the other water tracking apps haven't been updated in years and they're pretty boring looking. I only wish this had Android Wear support. Otherwise I can't fault it at all.

Just what I needed A nice unobtrusive app that reminds you with the sound of water pouring. You can set your own schedule, and it does not drown you in ads--only one a day. I would give it 10 stars if I could.

Nice design and easy to use. Has some customisable options, including a dark mode. An extra reminder option, 'No reminder when you're ahead' would be good. So that when we're on track and ahead of the water intake the reminders don't keep showing up. Edit: App quickly incorporated this feature! Thanks Oleg.

title: Drink Water Reminder - Alarm
description:
Do you want to be fit and healthy?
Improve your metabolism and be beautiful.
Stay hydrated!
 
Are you having problems with regular water drinking? It is really bad for your health! Problems with skin or weight are things you are prone to.
Drink Water Reminder will help you to control level of hydration properly to your needs and your lifestyle. Drinking water will become a routine and your organism will soon feel that change.
Remember that water occurs also in other liquids; coffee, juice, tea or milk. Our application enables you to add every kind of drink so you can be very precise in controlling your hydration level.
Using Drink Water Reminder, you can:

set up notifications reminding you about drinking ( you are able to turn it off)
create personal profile and goals to achieve
monitor how much you drank and remaining amount to reach the goal
calculate the right amount of liquids based on your height, age, weight and gender
add different kinds of drinks
track your improvements


gain awards depending on achieved goals which motivate for systematic hydration
Why drinking water is so important? Bear in mind that water occurs in every cell of your body. That‚Äôs why proper amount of water is essential for our organism. Water regulates body temperature, increases metabolism and detoxifies. You will feel its deficiency by problems with skin, reduced concentration or sleeplessness. Take care of your health and constantly control your hydration level!
descriptionHTML:
Do you want to be fit and healthy?
Improve your metabolism and be beautiful.
Stay hydrated!

Are you having problems with regular water drinking? It is really bad for your health! Problems with skin or weight are things you are prone to.
Drink Water Reminder will help you to control level of hydration properly to your needs and your lifestyle. Drinking water will become a routine and your organism will soon feel that change.
Remember that water occurs also in other liquids; coffee, juice, tea or milk. Our application enables you to add every kind of drink so you can be very precise in controlling your hydration level.
Using Drink Water Reminder, you can:

  • set up notifications reminding you about drinking ( you are able to turn it off)

  • create personal profile and goals to achieve

  • monitor how much you drank and remaining amount to reach the goal

  • calculate the right amount of liquids based on your height, age, weight and gender

  • add different kinds of drinks

  • track your improvements



gain awards depending on achieved goals which motivate for systematic hydration
Why drinking water is so important? Bear in mind that water occurs in every cell of your body. That‚Äôs why proper amount of water is essential for our organism. Water regulates body temperature, increases metabolism and detoxifies. You will feel its deficiency by problems with skin, reduced concentration or sleeplessness. Take care of your health and constantly control your hydration level!
summary: Take care of proper hydration of your organism and enjoy good health!
recentChanges: Small improvements
comments: Impossible to compute for fluid choices. Just one so other fluid doesn't count. Uninstalled.
No alarm or reminder notification. Have to manually add all entries.
Always reminds me at the same time regardless if I've drank more than enough. Also, I'm required to know my weight in Kg. I live in the US, not UK.
Really useful app. I allways forget to drink water. Now my body is hydrated. I think personally best drink water app. Thank you
I am not sure I like that "coffee" is included with the intake of water in this app. I always heard you needed extra water to combat the effects of caffeine. ?

title: Water Drink Reminder - Hydro
description:
The Hydro application is a simple water drink reminder, to motivate you to regularly drink the correct amount.

If you do not drink the correct amount of water, this is the perfect application, which will restore your healthy habits and will help you care for proper hydration.
After installing, the application calculator will calculate and suggest the water demand of your body, which will become your daily goal to achieve. 
Reminders that you can adjust to your needs will ensure that you will never again forget about regularly drinking water and additionally monitor and compare your results on charts and statistics.

Due to its functionalities as well as the possibility of full personalization,  Hydro is the most advanced application of this type on the market. Try it yourself!

App features include:
‚òÖ Water demand calculator ‚Äì will calculate and suggest the amount of water to drink each day 
‚òÖ Reminders ‚Äì will ensure regular hydration
‚òÖ Charts and statistics - will show your progress as you regularly drink water
‚òÖ Adjustable sizes of containers - adjust them to your needs
‚òÖ Multilanguage ÔºàDeutsch, English, Espa√±ol, Fran√ßais, Italiano, –†—É—Å—Å–∫–∏–π, Polski, Portugu√™s, ‰∏≠Êñá, Êó•Êú¨Ë™ûÔºâ
‚òÖ automatic backup copies in a cloud
‚òÖ data transfer between various devices
‚òÖ access to analyses and charts from web browser (http://hydro-app.com)

Regular consumption of fluids may increase your efficiency and vitality, and affect your health and condition.  

The demand for fluids depends on the individual dispositions of each person, so the calculations of the Hydro  application calculator should be treated solely as auxiliary guidelines.

recentChanges: Minor bug fixes and improvements
comments: This app is very helpful for me. I don't always think about drinking water so the alarms are very helpful. Make sure to set an alarm sound you can hear. Controls are easy. I say good job. Not very many ads either. It was free so i knew there would be some. I was pleasantly surprised that there hasn't been very many at all.

I am not able to mute the sound which happens when daily drink target is achieved. Is it compulsory that music should play even if I do not want to listen it. I may be sitting in office or in meeting or anywhere, but whenever the target is achieved the music is played compulsorily. Pleasd let me know how to mute that sound.
The sounds/reminders sometimes do not come, though I wait for them. Maybe I have not set it correctly?ü§î
This is so helpful for getting me on track. I am supposed to drink a lot of water to keep my kidneys clear. It seems to be working.
I liked it a lot.... the app reminds me to drink water and there are many options of how much water you drink... so im really happy with it

title: Waterbalance
description:
Waterbalance is an easy-to-use and functional mobile application to help you track your water balance based on the individual parameters: height, weight, age and lifestyle, with the daily schedule and plans considered. 
The application will become your reliable friend and advisor and will help you control the water balance turning water drinking into a healthy habit. Your body will be really grateful to you!

Here is a new incentive to download the latest version of Waterbalance app. Now you can use your Wear OS smartwatch to add the drinks you‚Äôve consumed during the day. The only catch is that you should add your first drink from the app itself before you can start tracking daily intake all from your wrist.
