summary: Transform water drinking into a useful habit
recentChanges:
‚Äî we have increased the number of drinks;
‚Äî now the Settings offer more types of training sessions and exercises - ranging from cycle rides to TRX. We consider their complexity, intensity and duration which might influence your water intake.
‚Äî in close collaboration with a nutrition expert, we have improved the daily water intake formula with allowance for the individual differences and lifestyle of users.
‚Äî other enhancements have been made to ensure stability and reliability of the app.
comments: Good but... I would give 5 stars but the notifications are every 2 hours which I believe is far too long in between each drink (for me) to be able to get in all 2+ltrs per day and there's no option to change it. The notifications are also silent! That is pointless for me if I dont have my phone in my hand at the time. It would be great to have the option to change settings for notofications - some more variations would take this to a 5 star rating. X

I was that person, that drank maybe a 15 oz water bottle in a week and a standard cup of coffee everyday. The very beginning of using this app, I was still struggling even getting 50% water intake. But when I got my first 100% i was proud, and this keeps streaks, and the competitive side of me wanted to keep that streak. You get badges for achievements (which is a cute idea). I only have 2 points for women constructive criticism. 1. Saving constant drinks. 2. More specific drinks to record
The Add Drink menu has a very twitchy drink selection menu. By the way, please add a dark theme.

I'm honestly liking this app after 1 full day- but I'm really irked that I can't add more than 20 ounces of water at a time. I have two different size water bottles. None of which are 20oz or below. One size is 24oz; the other 32oz. I have multiple of each size. I will not be buying any 20oz bottle(s) to comply with this restrictive function of the app. I may delete it, if I get too irritated with having to make more than one entry per finished water bottle. Lame.
How to remove drinks that you don't use in the bottom tab?

title: Crazy Water - Puzzle Games
description:
Crazy Water is a puzzle game that will indulge in people of any age.

Easy to get started, physics simulation, unlimited challenges, full of endless fun.

Play
* Line puzzle, level crack. You need to draw a line in a stroke to let the water in the bottle flow into the cup. The marking should be accurate, otherwise the water flow will be lost quickly.
* Try the best way to find each level. You can think of a unique solution, so break the regular thinking and get creative!
* Some levels look easy, but let's see if you really get 3 stars.

Characteristics
* Dynamic mechanism. Freely draw lines to complete the level!
* Simple, smart, fun and challenging puzzle game!
* The level is heavy and more levels will be released soon!
* Fun and relaxing theme to immerse you in it!

comments: The game is ok except for not being able to see the line as I draw it and most of the time the line disappears after I draw it.
The drawing is a bit clunky but the game is fun. Used to hang but seem good now.
Why the f the line is always cut off to a frickin dot.... And the physics are so many bugs
Good fun but 6 seconds to complete a level and then a 60 second ad!
This game is fun and challenging! I‚Äôve achieved all the levels and challenges, now what? I would also like to see a way to go back and easily access levels that I need to re-do (2 stars).

title: Drink Water Reminder and Hydration Tracker - BeWet
description:
The convenient reminder to drink water on time and body hydration tracker for those who want to lose weight, adjust the water balance of the body, improve metabolism, or for those who forget to drink water throughout the day.

Water is very important in our body. Do you know that one glass of water easily awakens the body after sleep and one is enough to lighten your mood or calm down. Regular consumption of water helps to improve health and normalize metabolism. Water helps you lose weight because there are no calories in the water.

Lack of water in the body entails many negative effects, such as headache, deterioration of health and skin color, irritability, etc. But with reminders to drink water it does not threaten you since we will always remind you when you need to drink water.

‚è∞ Reminders when to drink
You can use auto or set the manual time settings when reminders should be arrive to drink water.

üçπ Drinks
Tea, coffee, juice, milk, etc. Track water or your favorite drinks and their hydration indices to correctly calculate water saturation.

üíß How much to drink water per day
Enter your current weight and application will help you determine how much water your body needs every day.

‚òÄ Weather and training
Depending on the weather and physical activity, the application will adjust a daily target.

‚öñ Weight Control
Track your weight and body mass index. Great tool for losing weight.

üëå Convenience
Customize a most used volumes for quickly adds a new intakes. Choose your own or several of our melodies for reminders. You can also set reminders sound plays on the alarm volume.

üìä Statistics and üìñ History
Track amount of water and drinks you drink per week, a month or even a year.

Hydrate yourself and stay in shape with reminders drink water!

recentChanges:
üåä Reminder to drink water has become a little better!
üìù Now you can set custom title and message for reminder.
comments: I like that it allows you to put in different drinks and if it doesn't list it you can input it. I myself usually only use coffee, water and occasionally milk. I do wish there was a function where you could adjust the timing for the alarm for say every 15 minutes or 30 minutes. Other than that I have no problem with it. It was easy to set up. I use it to track how much I'm drinking each day and another to remind me to take a drink every so often. lol
the best water reminder app Ive tried so far, not complicated at all, asks exactly what's needed to know. definitely sticking to it, love it! üíñ
Simple and practical. App does everything i wanted. Can add water as well as coffee or any other drink.
LOVE the timer notification so I don't get too busy to drink.

Great support. Professional, polite, understand and super responsive. I like how I can select the type of drink. I'm not a big fan of using words like "hurry" in push notification messages, but I understand that being able to customize the message might be on the roadmap :) I've tried several drink tracker apps, and this one scored a shared first place.

recentChanges: - Fixed Minor Bugs
comments: The only major issues I have with this app is that I have the glass set to 6 ounces and it doesn't calculate correctly. It always calculates 6.1, 6.2 or 6.3 ounces each click. I've checked my settings numerous times and it IS set at 6.0. The other issue is that you can't select a custom tone for the reminder. I would like to be able to set a custom tone to know without picking up my phone that the alert is to drink water and not something else.

App allows tracking of liquids beyond plain water but parts of it are a bit tough & time consuming to figure out/not user-friendly or intuitive plus no matter what settings & fixes I've applied I cannot get the app to send my phone any notifications, much less forward them to my fitbit. My previous water app worked fine in that regard but didn't have an other beverages feature. Still I guess I'll go back to that one because at least the notifications worked properly with no hoops to jump through
It's helping me to drink more water. I just wish there weren't so many ads.
Great tool to remind me to drink water.
easy and fun to use

title: Pure Water Bottle Factory: Healthy Drink Maker
description:
Little boys and girls who wants to run their factory business! Make sure that our drinking water should be clean, hygienic, pure and full of minerals & carbohydrates. Water is the most consumed drink in the world and also added to other popular beverages includes tea and coffee. No fruit juice, coconut water or any other drinks comes equal to it. Water is an essential part of life as it is up to 60% of an adult human body. See the opportunity and start your own mineral water factory near a town to run profits. There are many cola soda drinks and fresh juice maker factories in the town but there is no factory for making & labeling water bottle.

Pure Water Bottle Factory game is an opportunity for little boys and girls to learn and see how water is purified and supplied to store in sealed mineral water bottles from scratch in this free offline game for girls. Play water factory simulator and experience real processing of pure water to deliver drinkable fresh water to supermarket, stores and shopping malls. These mineral water games for girls are as much fun as other cooking simulation games.

Join the water bottle simulation game as the worker and drive the water tanker truck to the well for filling the water tanker. Place pipes in the well and build a water pumping motor to extract water. After repairing and fixing the motor switch it on to fill the water tanker. Take the water truck to the water bottle factory to boil, filter and supply water to the city. 

Process of Pure Water Purification

First stage is to fill the water tank from the well. Drinking water sources are subject to contamination and require appropriate treatment to remove disease-causing agents. Use¬†water filtration methods¬†for water treatment to provide safe drinking water for communities. Chemical & minerals with a positive charge are added to the water. The positive charge of these chemicals neutralizes the negative charge of dirt and other dissolved particles in the water and water is set free of any contamination. Once it is done fill the bottle with fresh contamination free water and make sure to not waste water. Don‚Äôt forget to¬†label water bottles. Once the labeling of bottles is completed, next stage is to seal the bottle with capping machine to execute the perfect packaging operation, manage your time within time management to carry out the whole process in smooth and precise manners. 

Pure Water Bottle Factory gameplay:

Fill the Water tank and take it to factory games.
Fill bottles, label it and pack it.
Deliver pure fresh water to grocery stores.
Boil the water to remove bacteria.
Water filtration to remove particles.

Download Pure Water Bottle Factory and learn the art of filtered drinking water processing in 2019.

title: Drink Water Reminder : Daily Tracker & Monitor
description:
Water is essential to our life, drinking enough and right quantity of water is vital to our health. But because of our bad memory, busy work or too many little things, the day is ended before we drink enough water.


Drink Water App's functions are :

+ Is simple and easy. Making it adequate for any age
+ Daily water intake calculator based on your sex, weight and country(Hot/Cold). Lets you know how much water you should drink daily.
+ Notifications and reminders to remember you to drink water as you prefer and helping you to drink more water.
+ Automatic bed time mode so you don't receive reminders on the middle of the night. Making it a smarter reminder.
+ Graphic display of your hydration level and daily consumption.
+ Easy to add or modify a alert time. show you stocks of water remaining to take.
+ Consumption Chart Statistics so you can know your hydrated level and have all the drink water benefits.
+ Customize sound and message of alert as you want to receive.
+ Track History of logged water and adjust past water consumption.
+ oz and ml support
+ ensure your water delivery on time
+ maintain your Better Health Statistics and Health Plans
+ integration to health app


Advantages of have a good water balance

+ Stay slimmer
Revs up metabolism and helps you feel full.
Replace calorie-laden beverages with water and drink more before meals to help you feel fuller.
weight maintain and over weight person to reduce weight , may help in weight loss

+ Boosts your energy
If you're feeling drained and depleted, drink more. Beign dehydrated makes you feel fatigued.

+ Lower stress
85% of your brain tissue is water. If you're dehydrated, both your body and your mind will be stressed.

+ Build muscle tone 
One of the water benefit is to prevent muscle cramping and lubricates joints in the body.

+ Nourish your skin
Fine lines and wrinkles are deeper when you're dehydrated. drinking hydrates skin cells and plumps them up, making your face look younger.

+ Stay regular
Along with fiber, water is essential for good digestion. invest into your future.

+ Reduces kidney stones
The rate of painful kidney stones is rising because people, including children, aren't drinking enough water.
water dilutes the salts and minerals in your urine that form the solid crystals known as kidney stones.

+ Better Health
improve your health plans and move a head with finest water delivery , make this app as your better health and fitness trainer


Note : App provide you water information based on your weight, sex and country(hot/cold), consult a doctor in your area for better intake.

please write your experience as review, this would help a lot.
if any demand just go to feedback section in app we are always there.

thank you for using this water app!.

Great app, one if the best looking and operating water app I have used!

The whole concept of the app is interesting, but not executed that well. The reminder notifications could especially benefit from a change, mainly because they continue popping up even after finishing your daily goal! A congratulations message of some sort upon finishing that goal would also make the experience more appealing and give a sense of accopmlishment!

Better than all the other drink water apps because I can choose the size of the cup/bottle and just indicate the water reduction in the bottle. BUT I've noticed that if I go a day without using the app it'll stop sending me reminders which is weird. Having to manually go into the app to get it to start sending notifications every morning is annoying because I wont notice until it's like 2pm and I realize I went the whole day without drinking water.

title: Drink Water Reminder - Daily Water Tracker, Record
description:
Do you always forget to drink water regularly?
What would happen if you don‚Äôt drink enough water?

Our body is about 60% water, give or take. Water is essential to our life, but we are constantly losing water from our body through breathing, sweating, and urinating. Drinking enough water is vital to prevent dehydration. But because of bad memory or busy work, the day may end before we drink enough water.

Drink Water Reminder messages you to finish enough water intakes to stay hydrated every day. Drink Water Reminder helps you keep good water drinking habit and find unexpected benefits for health. 

Drink Water Reminder Key Features
üíß Customize your daily hydration schedule
There are many different opinions on how much water you should be drinking every day. Drink Water Reminder will not calculate your hydration amount by weight or height like other apps, just set your ideal daily water drinking plan, Drink Water Reminder will notify you drink when it‚Äôs time and help you finish daily hydration plan.

üîî Help you to reach daily hydration goal
 Notifications and reminders to remember you to drink water as you prefer on reasonable time duration and will not remind you in sleep time. Help you to keep enough water intakes for your body and keep fit.

üèÜ  Record your daily water intake
Drink Water Reminder will remind you to drink via notification; just touch to log each drinking manually to make sure each glass of water drunk will be recorded. Drink Water Reminder will keep your every record and generate report for you to do review or analysis.

üíß Track different drink's water share
Drinks contain water with different percentage so they are hydrating. Drink Water Reminder will record almost all drink‚Äôs water share: milk, coffee, fruit juice, beer, soda, tea, soft drinks, canned soups‚Ä¶to make your water intakes data more accurate.

üìà  Chart your water drinking history
Check graphic display of your hydration level and daily consumption by day, week and year. We will add more drinking analysis data to help you understand more about yourself. 

 Health benefits of drinking enough water 
+Water helps you speed up metabolism.
+ Drinking more water helps you lose weight, stay in shape as clean water diet is calorie free. 
+ Water can help in kidney stone, constipation, diabetes and more illnesses prevention.
+ Proper hydration keeps your nails clean and healthy. 
+ Water can help hydrate the skin and reduce acne.
+ Drinking more water provides general health benefits.

Do not wait to be thirsty before you get some H2O, since thirst is a signal that your body is in dehydration already.

Keep hydrated, keep energetic, and keep healthy.

Stay with us 
Email: drinkwatereminder@gmail.com
Please let us know any of your feedback or feature suggestion as review, this would help a lot. We are here working on to improving. 

Support Languages
English, German, French, Japanese, Portuguese, Spanish, Chinese(Simplified), Chinese (Traditional)

Thank you for using this water tracker app!

title: Aqualert:Water Intake Tracker &Reminder Google Fit
description:
Aqualert is a water tracker and water reminder app to create the water drink habit. 
It Sends daily reminders and alerts to motivates you to drink water and keeps a log of your daily aqua intake.
For the google fit users , Aqua Alert water tracker and water reminder work with it.

The Benefits of drink water are huge: weight control , skin condition, hair condition, organs function, energy level and many others.

Helps you to have a good water balance on your body using notification drink reminder and a tracker of how much you should drink. 

Aqualert water intake tracker functions are :

* Is simple and easy. Adequate for any age
* Daily intake calculator, tracker and reminder based on your sex, weight and activity level. Lets you know how much water you should drink daily.
* Notification , Alert and reminder to remember you to drink water as you prefer and helping you to drink more.
* Automatic bed time mode so you don't receive reminder on the middle of the night. Making it a smarter reminder and tracker.
* Graphic & Log display of your hydration level and daily consumption.
* Calculate how many servings you have left.
* Easy to add or remove a serving from the water tracker
* Use our serving size or customize your serving size and reminder
* Consumption Chart History so you can know your hydrated level and have all the drink water benefits.
* Automatic notes of why be hydrated, when you are hydrated and when you take more  than you need
* Google Fit Integration


* Stay slimmer
Revs up metabolism and helps you feel full.
Replace calorie-laden beverages with water and drink more before meals to help you feel fuller.

* Boosts your energy
If you're feeling drained and depleted, drink more. Beign dehydrated makes you feel fatigued.

* Lower stress
85% of your brain tissue is water. If you're dehydrated, both your body and your mind will be stressed.

* Build muscle tone and stay Fit
One of the benefit is to prevent muscle cramping and lubricates joints in the body.

* Nourish your skin
Fine lines and wrinkles are deeper when you're dehydrated. Drinking hydrates skin cells and plumps them up, making your face look younger.

* Stay regular
Along with fiber, water is essential for good digestion.

* Reduces kidney stones
The rate of painful kidney stones is rising because people, including children, aren't drinking enough water.
It dilutes the salts and minerals in your urine that form the solid crystals known as kidney stones.

Check Aqualert water tracker and reminder website on http://aqualertapp.com

Contact Aqualert water tracker and reminder team us on contactus@aqualertapp.com

Disclaimer  Aqualert water tracker and reminder http://aqualertapp.com/#disclaimer

summary: üíßEasy Way To Track and Drink More Water Using Logs & Reminders During The Dayüîî
comments: Wonderful, Friendly and easy to use Health & Wellness program, This Encourages, Inspires and Reminds to drink plenty of water, to better care for the body. It has been so helpful and I feel great when I am on track with my goals. This program keeps really detailed and manageable progress

Great app that allows for customization of goals, as well as recommendations. It has helped me get back on track with making sure I drink enough water during the day. My job has me do busy, I have found myself guilty of neglecting this part of my health and self-care. I like that it is simple to use and super easy to learn. I don't mind the ads, so for me, there is no reason to opt for the paid version--the free one works great.

This app has really helped me keep hydraded. I was drinking very little fluids a day. I probably didn't drink much more than 40oz and I was 260lbs. I'm down to 245lbs after about a month or so and I feel so much better. I can think more clearly, I have more energy, and I'm not as hungry as I use to be. At first, I had to urinate constantly, but it's getting to the point where it is not so frequent anymore.
it's quite helpful. Helps keep track of your water intake by the constant reminders that you choose to set.

Had it for less than a minute before popup adds were making it disruptive. I am happy to pay for additional really cool features, not happy about feeling I have to pay for no disruption. Making the user feel like they have to pay to clear the ads is lazy, not creative development. Oh well.

title: WaterBy: Water Drink Tracker Reminder & Alarm
description:
Think what you need to survive is really just to survive. Food? Air? Social networks? 
 Let's focus on water. Water is of great importance to all living things; in some organisms, up to  90%  their body weight comes from water. Up to  60%  of the adult human body - water.

According to H.H. Mitchell, Journal of Biological Chemistry 158,  brain and heart  consist of  73% water , and  lungs  - about  83%  water.  Skin  contains  64%  water,  muscles and kidneys  -  79% , even  bones  contain large amounts of water:  31% .

Every day, people must consume a certain amount of water in order to live. Of course, this depends on age and gender, as well as where someone lives. Typically, an adult  man  needs  about 102 fl.oz  of water per day, while an adult  woman  needs about  75 fl.oz  per day. All the water that a person needs should not come from drinking liquids, since part of this water is contained in the food we eat.

Water Balance - Reminds you to drink enough water. Drinking water properly keeps your skin healthy and helps you adjust or maintain body weight.

Water Balance is the best water tracking app!

 Some features of this application: 
üíß Regular reminder of drinking water every day
üíß Daily water consumption reports
üíß Customizable water cup
üíß Not disturbing during sleep
üíß Custom volumes in Imperial (ounces) or Metric (ml)

Do you drink enough water? Do you forget to drink water regularly? This app will remind you to drink water every day and keep track of your habits.

You just need to enter your current weight and this application will help you determine how much water your body needs every day. Having finished drinking a cup of water, you need to add it in the application. The program will remember its volume.

 Benefits of Drinking Water: 
‚úîÔ∏è You stay fit because there are no calories in drinking water
‚úîÔ∏è You can cleanse your skin
‚úîÔ∏è You keep your skin and nails healthy

‚ù§Ô∏èStay healthy and drink enough water!

SOS! Feed electricity into the robot to wake him up!

Plumber is the latest logic puzzle games with HD graphics and vivid animation. All you need to do is to rotate pipes, connect them and make water paths. Touch the pipes to turn them and form a complete pipe.

How to play:

‚òÖ Free boosters to help you solve puzzles

title: Drink Water: Water tracker and reminder alarm
description:
Drink Water Reminder is a great app to help you stay hydrated throughout a day! 

Drink Water Reminder is a tracker with an alarm built in to let you know not only how much water you have already consumed, but also to remind you when your next glass of water should be. 

All you have to do is choose your preferred glass, set your reminder and off you go! 

During the day, you will receive Drink Water Reminder's notifications that it is time to hydrate your body. Thanks to a vast number of glass sizes, now you don't have to worry about always having the same size glass next to you.
 
Drink Water Reminder's design is highly effective, giving you a visual of how much water you have already consumed and how much water you need to reach your daily water intake. It also provides you with the time when you drank water as well as what the glass size you used. 
 
Detailed statistics in graphics gives you a clear idea of your weekly/monthly/yearly water intake.

Stay fit, keep your health in check and download our Drink Water Reminder now! 

Features 
‚úî Scheduled notifications according to the wake up/ sleep time
‚úî A vast choice of glasses in standard (fl.oz) or metric (ml) units
‚úî A customizable glass
‚úî Detailed graphs 
‚úî Real time results
‚úî Visually pleasing design
‚úî Easy to use

‚òÖ ‚òÖ ‚òÖ ‚òÖ ‚òÖ 
Thank you for taking the time to review our application.

title: üåä Water Physics Simulation üåä
description:
Do you like liquid simulations? Do you like the flow behavior of water? Do you like bomb explosions? 
If yes, then you will have much fun with the Physics Sandbox app. [by gaming-apps.com]

Three physics simulations in One:
1. Shipping / Raft Survival: You can build your own ship or use a pre-builted boat and try to survive,
    if you go on a raft trip with your boat now.

2. Powder Game: If one use the real-time sandbox, then you can play with our bomb simulator or simulate    
    diverse states of waterbody under different influences in every areas of the room. Furthermore you can build for example a house and let it explode later.
 
3. Liquid simulator: One can watch various structures, ships, buildings, dust etc. 
    and they interact together in different forms, if you insert prefabricated user-actions like a spawner... into  
    the Simulation. 

Features:
- this game is free!
- a) sandbox, build for examle a wall and throw bombs to it (Powder Game)
- b) raft survival (shipping mode) 
- c) 24 prefabricated level designs (simulation mode)
		
- construct your own boat with 13 different single parts of a ship
- 6 prefabricated levels in the section "shipping"
- one can add to a own constructed boat 4 prefabricated
- furthermore: 5 bombs types + 5 upgrades per bomb with different explosions
- 4000 water particles (soft bodies /powder/ dust)
- watch the general behavior of fluid, e.g. pressure, flow behavior, spread in the observation room,
special effects, etc.
- build and control your boat
- create various structures like a house, a seesaw, a tower ... be creative

And now have fun with our free physics game everybody!

by gaming-apps.com

This game is free, but shows ads from AdColony.com

title: Water Pipe Repair: Plumber Puzzle Game
description:
Water Pipe Repair: Plumber Puzzle Game is Water Pipes puzzle game with the main objective "Connect the pipes to make water flow".
If you love Plumber physic puzzle games before you will love this game too. This Plumber Pipe Repair game is very addictive and time killer for you, will burn hours of you.

HOW TO PLAY:
- As Plumber Man, try to repair water pipe, connecting pipe to each other.
- Will have some decoy pipes on levels, try to avoid or use hint to clear that.
- When all pipe can make water flow to tank, you win.

title: Feed Me Water - One Line Drawing Puzzles for Kids
description:
Feed Me Water - The sequel to the most addicting physics-based puzzler has finally arrived.
The glass is sad because it's empty. Your job is to draw a line to make the glass filled up with liquid and smile again!
One Line Drawing a line to feed the water to the emmty glass and make it happy.
You are free to play all levels of the games, try to find the best way to solved each levels.
If you are want to have some nice puzzle with drawing games and water games, this is the game that you looking for.
Try to find the best way to complete each level. You can come up with your own solution so be creative and don't be affraid to think out of the box!
Some levels might look easy but let's see if you can actually get the 3 stars.

Features :
‚Ä¢ Play 100+ levels and challenges
‚Ä¢ Dynamic fun mechanism. Draw lines freely to complete levels!
‚Ä¢ Experience fun mechanics, Simple, smart and fun puzzles but can be challenging too
‚Ä¢ Lots of levels with more coming soon!
‚Ä¢ Fun and relaxing theme that will make you stay for quite some time
‚Ä¢ Stuck on a level? Use hints to help you solve the puzzles!

Having fun with Feed Me Water!

title: Nox WaterTime üíß Remind Drink Water, Daily Tracker
description:
Stay Fit and Be Healthy with Water Time Reminder

Use the Nox WaterTime app to plan your drinking schedule, and track a histogram of daily, weekly or monthly consumption. You will get the suggestion, set custom goals and track ongoing averages. Drinking the right amount of water is very important to keep your skin healthy and beautiful, boost weight loss. 

üíß Track water and keep body hydrated
You can easily create a profile to maintain health records and analyze your records with Nox Water Time. Simply go to the settings and select the Personal Data section and fill out all the important fields there correctly and done. Tracking your water will so much easier when you have set your data which will be there at the duty all day long to remind you to take your glass of water.

‚è∞ Set a reminder and have healthy skin
Nox WaterTime app is quite easy to use and creating reminders is so easy that you don‚Äôt have to struggle with how much water quantity, which unit and when to set. Simply set your water reminder and you are so good to clear up your skin and make your skin much healthier all day long. 

üç∂ Customize daily water needs and speed up Metabolism levels
If you have just begun your daily water drinking schedule. You can use Nox Water Time to customize a beginner to drink 4 or 5 liters of water every day and start as your comfort levels and capacity to speed up your metabolism levels.

üìä View graph & history and promote overall health
There are a chart and graphical representation which shows how much water has your drunk through a period in Nox WaterTime. Check your daily, weekly and monthly water consumption on the Water Time.

ü•õ Note water volume and deliver oxygen throughout the body
Blood is more than 90 percent water, and blood carries oxygen to different parts of the body. You can customize the app based on the type and size of drinking cups, and it will note the volume of water you have drunk every day. You should drink enough water daily to deliver oxygen throughout the body and keep all the body functions going pretty well with the reminder of Nox WaterTime.

üìâ Support weight records and help in weight loss
In the Nox Water Time app, you can record your daily weight and set the water track. Drinking a good amount of water is an important factor when it comes to losing weight, even more than exercise. You can keep your weight under control with a healthy water plan.

title: Water Live
description:
WaterNSW is the bulk water supplier and system operator in NSW. We seek to improve availability of water that is essential for water users and the communities throughout the state.

WaterLive provides you with access to real-time information from our automatic digital devices from over 1,200 water monitoring sites throughout the state. Information includes stream, storage or groundwater levels, streamflows, storage volumes, water temperatures, rainfall and various types of water quality data. You can find sites by searching for the site name, ID or its river or basin, or by using the map. You can save sites as ‚Äúfavourites‚Äù to easily access your favourite sites and view a summary of the data. The "watches" function allows you to quickly see whether the water level at a site has exceeded a set level for example. Try it now!

title: Feed the Fish - Drink Water Reminder & Track Sugar
description:
Feed the Fish is a drink water reminder app to help you have a healthier lifestyle, build a good water drinking habit, and monitor your sugar intake. 

A good water drinking habit ensures good health 
Drinking sufficient water daily boosts your metabolism and helps the body properly break down food and also helps to flush out toxins

A little naughty, a little nice. It's all about balance
By monitoring your sugar intake, you can keep a healthy balance that will keep your blood sugar at a healthy level. Don't need to rush though, for keeping a healthy balance takes time and dedication. as they said Slow and steady wins the race

Features:
‚Ä¢ Easy and simple to use
‚Ä¢ Manage the drink water reminder to fit your activities
‚Ä¢ Get a recommendation of how much water to drink and sugar daily intake based on your gender, age, and weight
‚Ä¢ Adjust the water volume and sugar level to match what you drink or eat
‚Ä¢ View timeline and summary of your water and sugar daily intake in the past month

With the help of our drink water reminder, let's improve our health and make drinking water a good habit! 

Discover many other cute icons and background music to make your drink water journey more fun!

title: Water App (Reminder & Tracker)
description:
Adequate amount of water is required for good health, glowing skin & weight loss. Most of us do not drink enough quantity of water daily. Water App (Reminder & Tracker) will help you to drink water adequately and regularly.

Your daily adequate water intake is computed with reference to the scientific opinion given through a study by European Food Safety Authority (EFSA). You just have to simply feed your gender and age in Water App (Reminder & Tracker) and you get your daily adequate water intake. Of course you can very easily change your water intake quantity anytime based on your physical activity, environmental conditions, diet, health & medication and range of other factors. 

Water App (Reminder & Tracker) features:

1. Record your water intake in a very easy and simplified manner in the app. Shows animations. You will love it!

2. Gives you reminders to drink water as and when you want. App will suggest start and stop time and interval for reminders but you can change it very easily as per your need. 

3. Calculates and displays the amount of water you need to drink more in a day - both in quantity and number of glasses (or bottles ‚Äì based on whatever you choose).

4. Record your water intake using the container of your choice. Application will suggest some default containers (Bottle, glass or sipper) but you can change it to the one that you normally use. 

5. Graphical insight into your water drinking pattern with daily, weekly and monthly statistics

6. Choose unit of measurement - Metric (ml), US Oz and Imperial Oz

7. We have some light reminder sounds. Choose the reminder sound and you may turn it off also whenever you need to.

Supported in 16 languages:
Arabic, Chinese, English, French, German, Indonesian, Italian, Japanese, Korean, Malay, Portuguese, Romanian, Russian, Spanish, Turkish, and Vietnamese.

We hope you will like Water App (Reminder & Tracker). 

Happy water drinking!

title: Water Tracker: Water Drinking Reminder App
description:

This Water Tracker: Water Drinking Reminder App will help you to keep track of water intake per day! It also helps you to fulfill your recommended daily water intake goal! Now even if you miss out to drink water in your busy schedule, make use of Water Reminder App that reminds you to Drink Water at your pre-defined time.

Smart features of this water reminder app:

‚û∫ Set a desired goal for Water Consumption & keep track of your daily water consumption

This Water Reminder App will help you to remember to Drink Water at regular intervals and keep yourself hydrated! Track your Recommended Water Intake habits and increase it with the help of notifications from this Water Tracker: Water Drinking Reminder App!

Now, DON‚ÄôT FORGET TO DRINK WATER! And whenever you do, take out a minute to track your daily water intake with this Water Tracker app! Do share your results with us!

title: Water Balloon Splash
description:
The world‚Äôs coolest new matching 3 adventure, Water Balloon Splash!
with 900 BLOOMING LEVELS and NO LIVES SYSTEM so you can play as much as you wish.
Match the colorful water balloons and feel cool streams!
Get ready to fall in love with water balloons!
Match the balloons as many as possible to Clear levels and become the top balloon pop winner.
You can take on this delight alone or play with friends and family to see who can get the highest score!

Water Balloon Splash features
‚Ä¢ Never ending exciting match 3 puzzle game!
900 awesome levels!

‚Ä¢ What if I match the cross balloon with the color balloon‚Ä¶?
Match the various types of balloons as many as you can!
If you match more than 4 balloons, you will get a special balloon! You can even crush solid rocks!

If you match the balloon with the candy, you will get sweet candies!

With the colorful and powerful items, you can get rid of all obstacles such as mini crocodiles, dolphins and rubber cones!

You can still enjoy Water Balloon Splash without internet access.
Anywhere, anytime, match the balloons and make them pop! 

If you have a mania for match 3 game,
If you have a mania for puzzle game,
If you have a mania for crush game,
You must play this cool game!

title: Kids Water Adventure 3D Park
description:
Hello kids! After the hectic amusement slide park drive are you ready for the best school trip
ever? Welcome to the most adventurous and thrilling kids water slide theme park where all
school kids come to have lots of fun at water theme adventure park slide! Enjoy the amazing
school kids water swimming slides. The kids water park slide game is totally fun and
entertaining water sports adventure game where the crazy school amusement park kids can easily
enjoy and perform swimming water slide stunts as they want.
This game is an adventure for kids to have fun in adventure playground a huge water kingdom is designed in this adventure park like water fun, swim adventure, water slide adventure and many waterslide adventure sports you will experience. Buy tickets through the In-game money and enjoy the amusement park ride in this theme park game. Many water stunts and rides for kids also available in this waterslide 3d fantasy park. Enjoy the faster slide especially Indian waterslide in the aquatic world. Park boys can enjoy Water slide extreme airpark with an aqua splash which gives you a fun ride and pool fun in this water fun adventure theme park game.
So get ready for some swimming water park challenges and avail the chance of playing the
amazing kids water park simulator. Variety of new adventurous water park slides are waiting for
the crazy stunt school kids. Show your epic water swimming stunts and water diving skills by
this kids water adventure fun game. A big summer water racing sports treat is waiting for you, so
begin your water adventure school trip with this crazy water fun park.
Face challenging water slide swimming levels and hurdles to complete the water slide adventure
levels in this kids fun water park simulator. Collect slide rewards, earn maximum fun adventure
coins to get tickets and explore each fun school kids water slide. The underwater amusement
park world is totally different from the real swimming adventure slide world.
In this school kids water adventure game explore underwater amusement slide world. Be careful
some challenging water park slide hurdles are waiting for you but you have to remain calm to
become the best school kids swimmer and enjoy each and every moment of the kids water fun
theme sports park. The school kids can relish themselves from different kinds of water stunts
sports rides in this water racing park adventure game. It is very tricky and full of different
varieties of water racing sports slide games.
Get this amazing water slide school trip game. Enjoy different variety of water sports swimming
slides amuse yourself from newly designed fun water adventure park game. You have played
many fun adventure water park slide games but this is different from others as there are a variety
of new theme park water sports slides for school trip kids, which you can unlock from
completing one water amusement park mission.
Features:
‚óè Best designed water theme park fun adventure slide game.
‚óè Best school trip to the children's amusement park.
‚óè Collect rewards and earn coins to unlock more fun rides.
‚óè Realistic 3D HD water park environment.
‚óè Show your best swimming and water diving skills.
‚óè Best school trip summer treat ever.
‚óè Be careful from different hurdles as you have to prove yourself as a school champion
swimmer.
‚óè Smooth and easy control gameplay.
‚óè Challenging levels to get unlocked.
‚óè Experience the amazing thrill of water fun park slide adventure.
‚óè Amazing background music.

title: Drink water reminder - Water Hydration Alarm app
description:
Drink water reminder app is an app that helps in reminding you to drink water. It keeps track of when you had water last time so as to check the hydration level and remind you as soon as your body needs water. It provides an amazing report for you to check your hydration tracker and alarm.

Drinking water reminder app helps you in tracking your daily, monthly as well as yearly reports to give you enough data to optimize your routine. This app helps you in being healthy as water is the most beautiful thing and driving force of all nature.

Everyone should have this app where you won't forget when you have to drink next as this app has powerful alarm which optimizes with your usage of drinking water.

Drinking water frequently is really important for us that helps us in moving and working with a great pace using complete brain.

Try this app so that you'd never forget about drinking water and also you can optimize your drinking water frequency so as to be healthy forever.

NOTE: THIS APP DOESN'T ASK OR STORE ANY OF THE USER'S PERSONAL INFORMATION.

title: Water Reminder - Hydration & Drinking Tracker
description:
Water reminder allows you to drink water regularly, keep track of your daily drinking statistics and motivates you to drink water regularly.

If you drink very little water and you want to drink regular water, this water reminder & tracker is for you.

Water Reminder is ready for you with special water reminder alarm sounds, detailed water drinking graphics, daily water logs, simple interface and many more features.

This water drinking program will give you the feeling of a water drinking game and will help you to feel that you have a healthier body with each passing day.


With the water reminder you will receive special notifications of water drinking reminders outside of your sleep hours, and the purpose of these notifications is to kindly remind you to drink water.

Immediately after hearing the sound of the water reminder alarm, drink enough water and reach your daily goal to meet your daily water need.

This water reminder alerts you that you need to drink water in an audible and alarmed way, as well as keeping track of your drinking statistics.

Water is the most necessary thing for our health. That's why we have to intake water regularly. Water drink reminder & tracker has been developed to make your water intake more regular. First, we ask for your gender, weight and sleep time informations. Using this informations, we prepare a plan for you. We're kindly sending you notifications at the right times to reach your daily drinking target. Start using Water Reminder now for a healthier body.


üíß Water Reminder - Hydration & Drinking Tracker Main Features  üíß


üíß Water drinking reminder ‚Äì Water reminder app will remind you to drink water during the day at specific intervals so you never get thirsty and experience dehydration. Drink water app reminder is fully customizable. It will not disturb you when sleeping.

üíß Water tracker ‚Äì You can log water intake data by using a single button and you can edit daily hydration logs.  Log daily water intake by using our single tap water logging system to track every single H2O drinking session and reach the hydration goal determined by water calculator. Keep your healthy nails, healthy skin and your body even healthier.

üíß Statistics ‚Äì Drink Water Reminder app keeps track of your daily water intake, daily goal progress, and long-term statistics. All water intake history monitoring by clean and simple chart. In this way you will increase your motivation. See how this habit improves your health over time with this powerful body cleanse method which provides diabetes prevention and kidney stone prevention. 

üíß Daily Goal Calculator ‚Äì Automatically calculates your recommended daily water intake based on your gender and weight. This is a starting point in your clear water diet and it will provide you with healthy nails, healthy skin and healthy body. Drink water, stay healthy!

Water Reminder is ready for you with special water reminder alarm sounds, detailed water drinking graphics, daily water logs, simple interface and many more features.

This water drinking program will give you the feeling of a water drinking game and will help you to feel that you have a healthier body with each passing day.


With the water reminder you will receive special notifications of water drinking reminders outside of your sleep hours, and the purpose of these notifications is to kindly remind you to drink water.

Immediately after hearing the sound of the water reminder alarm, drink enough water and reach your daily goal to meet your daily water need.

This water reminder alerts you that you need to drink water in an audible and alarmed way, as well as keeping track of your drinking statistics.

Water is the most necessary thing for our health. That's why we have to intake water regularly. Water drink reminder & tracker has been developed to make your water intake more regular. First, we ask for your gender, weight and sleep time informations. Using this informations, we prepare a plan for you. We're kindly sending you notifications at the right times to reach your daily drinking target. Start using Water Reminder now for a healthier body.


üíß Water Reminder - Hydration & Drinking Tracker Main Features üíß


üíß Water drinking reminder ‚Äì Water reminder app will remind you to drink water during the day at specific intervals so you never get thirsty and experience dehydration. Drink water app reminder is fully customizable. It will not disturb you when sleeping.

üíß Water tracker ‚Äì You can log water intake data by using a single button and you can edit daily hydration logs. Log daily water intake by using our single tap water logging system to track every single H2O drinking session and reach the hydration goal determined by water calculator. Keep your healthy nails, healthy skin and your body even healthier.

üíß Statistics ‚Äì Drink Water Reminder app keeps track of your daily water intake, daily goal progress, and long-term statistics. All water intake history monitoring by clean and simple chart. In this way you will increase your motivation. See how this habit improves your health over time with this powerful body cleanse method which provides diabetes prevention and kidney stone prevention.

üíß Daily Goal Calculator ‚Äì Automatically calculates your recommended daily water intake based on your gender and weight. This is a starting point in your clear water diet and it will provide you with healthy nails, healthy skin and healthy body. Drink water, stay healthy!

title: Plant water reminders and journals + more - Plantr
description:
The nr 1 app for you that can't keep a single plant alive
or to the one that has so many plants you forget to water them or even worse overflowing them üò¢

STORIES

Let me tell you a story. It's about Lisa, Lisa always overflows her flowers. DO YOU WANT TO BE LIKE LISA?! 
Okay okay maybe a little dramatic. Here is another one, it's about Jake, 
Jake never water his plants so they die of dehydration! THAT'S LITERALLY MURDER!! 
Do you want to be like JAKE?!?!

ALSO

Are you tired of being like Lisa and Jake? 
Do you want to have healthiest plants in the world? 
Then calm the **** down i got you covered ‚ù§Ô∏è

With this Plant water reminder app you won't ever forget to water, fertilize or rotate your plants again! 
Let the plants live and forget about the word dehydration üéâ

Plants need constant care and the most important one is watering üí¶
This reminder app lets you add you plants and then set custom reminders for example water reminder. 
Later when it's time to water your plants we send you a reminder in form of a push notification so you can't miss it! 
Sounds great right?

MORE
Well there are more reasons! 
Plants gives us oxygen, don't be the person that suffocate because you didn't take care of your flowers.
With plant reminders it's not even hard to manage them, you literally have no excuse! 
Keep your plants healthy and alive today üòÉ

HOW TO
- add plant with image and name
- add desired reminders for example: water
- set desired water frequency
- leave app or view your garden
- get push notification
- open and press to water plant
- view graphs for soil moisture and watered amount for your plant

FEATURES
- Add plant to your garden
- Name that baby of yours
- Create a reminder to water, fertilize or rotate each plant!
- Get reminders when it's time
- Water, rotate, fertilize, mist or prune your plant
- Easily view plants that need water
- View details about specific plant
- Track plant soil moisture
- Track watering amount
- View graphs and time left to next water session
- Create and add journal entries for all your plants so you remember and can track all the things! 

UPCOMING FEATURES
- reminders for more things like 
  - Plant light
- more Journal additions

What are you waiting for? Take care of your plants today!

comments: Has been a GREAT app!! There is one issue with the "pick a date" function. You can't scroll past the current month with it. I'm using android. I like the concept of this function bcuz if the amount of "days" you need for your next repot, water, etc is alot it's easier to just use the "pick a date" function, but it doesn't work. The arrows for it only allow you to go back 1 month and forward into the current month. Otherwise an absolutely great functioning app.

I think this app is really cool!! I can put in a load of info about my plants and keep journals on them. It also allows you to put in photos so you can see how they grow I guess. It's also really cool how you can put in the watering times ect so it notifies you when to water or fertilise the plants. It's a shame you have to pay to get the full stuff, but people gotta earn money - so five stars! :)
Good! Does not seem to want to save custom pictures. Please add total plant counts or number of plants (total and per label). Hasn't been updated in a while so hopefully it hasn't been abandoned.

Loving the app so far! Very simple and intuitive to use. My only critique is the ability to have different time frame choices for the reminders ( weeks, months, years, etc ). It becomes tedious and a bit annoying when I have to adjust by days for every 2 years on repoting for example. Also, I may want to adjust a reminder instead of removing it and adding a new one. Would give 4.5 if I could. Definitely changing to 5 stars if these features are addressed.

I love this app!! It's pretty intuitive and the notifications work. It's helped me not over water my plants. I did pay 1.99 to get rid of the ads - worth every penny. I want to get the pro version but it's a bit pricey so I haven't yet. But honestly, I've tried all of the other water reminder apps, and this is by far the best one. Edit: I broke down and got the pro version. Absolutely worth it. The graphs provided have changed how I water my plants. Still the best app out there!

title: Water the tree!
description:
Each level is a challenging physics-based puzzle with amazing life-like mechanics.
Cut through dirt and guide fresh water to the tree! Every drop counts! 
The level is passed if at least one flower blooms on the tree. 
If three flowers will bloom you  have passed the level perfectly.

title: Water trackerüíß Hydration reminder & Drink water
description:
Water is the most important resource for the human body.Your health, well-being, endurance, appearance, and your day-to-day energy all depend on how much water you drink. It is also helpful to drink water for weight loss, so it is extremely necessary to monitor the balance of water consumption during your diet and when working out.
 
Enter data about yourself, and the Water tracker app will determine how much water you will need to drink per day. Control of water consumption will help regulate the balance of water in your body, and take into account the effectiveness of different beverages. Tracking of water drank is displayed in a simple and attractive layout, with colorful illustrations.
 
Install the Water Tracker, and you will get a universal, very convenient and easy to use water meter for losing weight. Or an indispensable assistant for your physical activity. It will count the water and show progress in an understandable graphic form.
 
 
‚úîÔ∏è Individual calculation of water consumption rate
 
Your goal - how much water to drink per day - will be determined based on an analysis of your unique parameters.
 
‚úîÔ∏è Scientific approach
 
We will help find a healthy and stable habit for drinking water for 42 days!
 
‚úîÔ∏è Counting water and taking into account the effectiveness of certain drinks
 
How often do you drink pure water? And how much tea, which is not as effective for maintaining the right water balance? Do you go for a glass of wine at dinner? Our water tracker will correctly take into account each glass of soda or morning Americana.
 
‚úîÔ∏è The most user-friendly interface
 
The application remembers from where you most often get water, and what other drinks you like. To add new data to the counter of water drank is very quick and easy.
 
Controlling water will be your true friend on the way to better health and body cleansing! Time to drink water!

*This app is way cooler when paired with your HidrateSpark smart water bottle*
Why keep track of your water intake manually when your water bottle can do it for you?

We all know drinking water is important but millions of us don‚Äôt get enough to drink each day, because it‚Äôs so easy to forget and hard to track, especially in our busy lives. Hidrate Spark is here to change that and make dehydration a thing of the past.

HIDRATESPARK SMART WATER BOTTLE GLOWS
HidrateSpark is a smart water bottle that automatically tracks how much water you drink and syncs with this app via bluetooth. This bottle will even glow from within when you need to drink more water.

HYDRATION HISTORY
See your hydration progress over time in a daily, weekly, and monthly view. How many days in a row can you reach your goal?

CUSTOMIZED DAILY GOAL
The app calculates a recommended hydration goal based on your personal parameters such as age, height, weight and gender. It can even use your location to determine the temperature, humidity and elevation of your surroundings to make sure your goal is customized specifically to you. You can also manually set your goal for health reasons if you‚Äôd like.

INTEGRATE WITH FITNESS AND HEALTH TRACKERS
Sync with popular fitness trackers and apps to further customize your goal based on your activity level. Whether you run, bike, swim, lift, do yoga, workout, or simply walk your activity level affects how much water you need to drink.

NEVER LOSE YOUR BOTTLE
Losing your water bottle sucks, that‚Äôs why we made it really hard for this to happen. When location services are turned on the app will know the last place it was paired with your smart water bottle and show you on a map, so you can go back and get it.

KEEP AN EYE ON YOUR FRIENDS
Keep an eye on your friends progress to make sure they are staying hydrated. Start some friendly competition to see who can get the best streak by meeting their goal the most days in a row.

FUN NOTIFICATIONS
The app will also send helpful reminders and notifications when you begin to fall off track and need to drink more water. The bottle will also light up and glow as a fun way to remind you to stay hydrated. Can your friends‚Äô water bottle do that?

*Drinking water is essential to your bodies health and well being. Check out some of the areas of your life that are affected by hydration.

COGNITION & MOOD: Your brain is comprised of 75% water, so proper hydration can have a positive impact on cognitive function and mood.

ATHLETIC PERFORMANCE: Even 1-2% dehydration can decrease physiological performance and 5 % dehydration can decrease your physical performance by 30%. So if you want to win, you better be hydrated.

HEALTH: Alongside a healthy diet and proper exercise, hydration can help dramatically improve your physical health.

WEIGHT LOSS: Combined with a  healthy diet and exercise drinking water can increase your metabolism and help you avoid eating and drinking extra calories.

INCREASED ENERGY: Drinking plenty of water helps with blood circulation thus decreasing your feeling of tiredness and fatigue.

AVOID HEADACHES: Staying properly hydrated can help avoid headaches.

HEALTHIER SKIN: Staying properly hydrated helps your skin stay hydrated to help it look younger and healthier.

BOOST IMMUNITY: Staying properly hydrated can help you fight off illness and infections.

PREGNANCY: Pregnant and breastfeeding moms need to be properly hydrated so they can support their new baby.

Learn more about HidrateSpark products and services at www.hidratespark.com

recentChanges:
Updated authentication for Healthmate integration. Fixed dark mode bug in the Help dashboard.
Other minor bug fixes.
comments: Definitely has gotten me to drink more water. It's a game changer. The app overall feels a little out dated. I wish the battery was rechargable or gave you a better idea when it was about to die. I end up losing a day or two of data when I don't notice. Don't buy Amazon brand batteries, they last 1/3 of the time than the one provided by the company.
It doesn't pair well with an android and I'm really disappointed! It will spend a long time "searching" and even when it finally connects it takes a long time to update.

The app is okay, but the hardware in the Spark water bottle isn't great. The lid band broke within a couple of weeks. For awhile I saw frequent (daily or more) Bluetooth disconnects. This lead to a weekly re-sync. Eventually I stopped using it and the battery died. I put in the replacement batteries, and they lasted less than a day. At this point it's kinda just a really expensive water bottle with no benefits.
Finally got it to work correctly. I like the reminders and being able to see my progress but I wish I could sync it to my Samsung health app and/or the my fitness pal app

Purchased this app and spark bottle for post bariatric surgery program. I'm 4 days out of surgery, 3 out of hospital. To this point the bottle is working perfectly. Reminds me 10 times during the day to take a drink. Updates my tablet within about 2-3 minutes with aggregate amount for the day in ounces or millimeters, your choice. Can set with either audio alert on tablet/phone or glow running up and down, or both should you so choose. Could not be more pleased with this product to this point.

description:

+ only natural music, no musical instruments, white noise
+ relax and sleep sounds and ringtones!
+ high-quality sounds of bird songs in rain forest 
+ sound of sea waves natural, roar of the surf, marine voice
+ sound of natural rainfall, waterfall, night forest
+ natural sound of water currents
+ relaxation ringtones
+ nature music
+ sleep cycle
+ soothing music - sleep sounds
+ absolutely relaxing
+ nature Sound Relax and Sleep

+ best good quality water sounds, sea sounds, wave sounds, rain sounds - sounds of nature
+ you will relax and sleep like baby
+ children fall asleep immediately
+ lullaby of nature
+ deep relaxation
+ white noise generator
+ nature music for android
+ animal sounds
+ sounds of nature
+ sleep cycle optimized
+ water sounds sleeping music
+ nature sounds
+ ambient sounds


Nature sounds (soothing music, bedtime sounds) could be used for: 
+ Rest and relaxation. Our sound atmospheres will help you relax after a hard working day and forget about all unpleasant emotions.
+ Pleasant recollections. In summer they will help you dive in the atmosphere of a cool rainy day or winter evening, and in winter you will recollect a sunny beach or the days of your childhood spent in the countryside.
+ Meditation, therapy and massage. Our atmospheres serve as a perfect background for meditation and massage. They also have a calming influence on pets and hide undesirable sounds. (sleep cycle)


Nature, in the broadest sense, is equivalent to the natural world, physical world, or material world. "Nature" refers to the phenomena of the physical world, and also to life in general. It ranges in scale from the subatomic to the cosmic.

The concept of nature as a whole, the physical universe, is one of several expansions of the original notion; it began with certain core applications of the word œÜœçœÉŒπœÇ by pre-Socratic philosophers, and has steadily gained currency ever since. This usage was confirmed during the advent of modern scientific method in the last several centuries.

Sound is a mechanical wave that is an oscillation of pressure transmitted through a solid, liquid, or gas, composed of frequencies within the range of hearing.[1] Sound also travels through plasma.

Sound is a sequence of waves of pressure that propagates through compressible media such as air or water. (Sound can propagate through solids as well, but there are additional modes of propagation). Sound that is perceptible by humans has frequencies from about 20 Hz to 20,000 Hz. In air at standard temperature and pressure, the corresponding wavelengths of sound waves range from 17 m to 17 mm. During propagation, waves can be reflected, refracted, or attenuated by the medium.

Water fit for human consumption is called drinking water or potable water. Water that is not potable may be made potable by filtration or distillation, or by a range of other methods.
Water that is not fit for drinking but is not harmful for humans when used for swimming or bathing is called by various names other than potable or drinking water, and is sometimes called safe water, or "safe for bathing". Chlorine is a skin and mucous membrane irritant that is used to make water safe for bathing or drinking. Its use is highly technical and is usually monitored by government regulations (typically 1 part per million (ppm) for drinking water, and 1‚Äì2 ppm of chlorine not yet reacted with impurities for bathing water).

title: Water Drops Real
description:
Beautiful realistic water live wallpaper. Touch a screen of your phone to make ripples and waves. Enjoy watching the water movement.

* Realistic water live wallpaper that reacts to touch
* Touch the screen to add water drops and cause ripples 
* Move your finger and make virtual water waves
* Select background from a set of beautiful built-in photos
* Custom background option so you can choose a photo from your own gallery
* Water simulation performance/quality control
* Automatic water drops option to simulate rain 
* 100% free and without ads!

To enable the wallpaper, go to:
Home screen -> Menu -> Wallpaper -> Live Wallpapers -> Real Water Live Wallpaper

Remember, the higher the quality, the more battery it consumes.

If you run into any problems, please send me an email. If you have an idea for a new feature, please let me know !

comments: Pretty nice live water app that lets you use your own background. With that said it needs a few necessary tweaks. When auto ripple is on the drops often make the background a bit noisy with ripples. I believe a slider or menu to adjust the automatic ripple frequency is a must. Also, a least to me, the water seems a bit thick. A slider to adjust the fluidity of the water would be nice. Finally fix the OS compatibility issue. I always get a statement that this was built for an older version.
I used more than 50 Water ripple live walpaper before but have never seen as realistic as it is. I like it so much. Some bugs it has. But I hope it will be fix also in future updates. Thanks.
Thanks to the developer for this app. This app is very light and customizable. I recommend everyone to try this app. Till now I haven't found any bugs in this app. It works well.
This watermated live wallpaper is close to perfection and the live water effects certainly complement the background when using the AP15 launcher. First Class development, thanks.
Love!!! Looks like real water drops!

recentChanges: New features, New Design and 64 Bit Support.
comments: Love this water tracker! It's fun and easy to use and very motivational! But it won't allow me to purchase the lifetime, only the monthly. Fix that and I'll give 5 stars!!

Puts ads over functions in app you need to use. Could not figure out how to get out of app had to turn phone off. App is total garbage. I did not like little things about the 1st 2 hydration apps i tried but this one is garbage.

This app could be useful. I don't mind ad supported apps, but when ads COMPLETELY block the bottom portion of the app where there are buttons necessary for use, it's absurd. I will not pay to remove ads in an app that I cannot test because of (purposefully?) inconveniently placed ads. Uninstalling and looking for another.

Update 7/21/19 I used to love this app. After the upgrade it doesn't work though. Paid for the "life time ad removal" years ago when I first got the app. With the upgrade it doesn't register I've paid. June 30th I emailed them to let them know about the problem. Got emailed back to use "restore" button, which did nothing. I let them know. Got a reply to be on for a 5 min time frame to "purchase for free" at a time I didn't see email. Have emailed several times since with no reply or fix.

I love it! Simple, fun, and motivational. I enjoy the inspiring image of a body filling up with water as you add ounces, and how confetti goes flying every time you add towards reaching your goal. There's also notifications you can set to remind yourself every hour on the hour to drink water. I'm trying the free 7 day trial, then I'll likely pay for continued full use. Good job for the visually appealing and motivational app.

title: Water Reflection Mirror Image
description:
A perfect photo editor app for you to create water reflection and photo mirror effects!

Water Reflection - Mirror Image allows you to create mirror effect in your photos with beautiful water ripples. You can create both left-right and up-down reflection with this photo editor app. Furthermore you can apply several photo effects and designer photo frames to these mirror photos for making them more attractive. 

With this Water Reflection - Mirror Image app, you can choose a photo from your gallery or capture one using your camera to generate the mirror photo with water ripple effects. Features include:

1. The mirror effects support both left-right reflection and up-down reflection. 
2. The water ripple texture is adjustable. 
3. A powerful photo editor is built-in with the app. With a great collection of photo editing tools, you can edit the mirror photo in a lot of ways:
     - Gorgeous photo effects and filters
     - Contrast, Warmth, Brightness, Tint and Saturation editing tools 
     - Auto enhancement with color and contrast improvement
     - Tens of photo frames, stickers and overlays.
     - Add text and captions
     - Crop, rotate, and straighten your photo
     - Sharpen and blur photos
     - Color Splash
     - Cosmetic tools: fix redeye, remove blemishes and whiten teeth
4. Save and share photos from inside the app.

This is the simplest image mirror photo editor to generate realistic water ripple effects on your photos. With such a user-friendly design and easy-to-use functionality, you can start running a photo studio at your fingertips right away!

Note: all the edited photos will be saved in a folder called "Water_Reflection".

title: Jurassic Dino Water World
description:
Welcome to Dino Water World where you can have different ocean dino species, build underwater home, and build your Jurassic underwater World. Explore the mysterious lost world of prehistoric animals. Collect exciting sea dinosaurs like Mosasaurus and Megalodon the shark. Raise, Crossbreed and Battle with your sea monsters.

Features 
- Free to play! 
- A wide variety of exciting sea dinosaurs to breed
- Fight in underwater battle arena 
- A crossbreeding mechanism
- Manage your water world as you would in real life- this includes feeding your water Dinosaurs, and arranging food resources

recentChanges: New designs and Bug fixing...
comments: Basic dino game. What I don't like about it is that you need gems to upgrade your dinos, and you can only get them if you watch ads, play a 'minigame', or pay for them at the store. Unless you want to go through the painstaking process of getting only 3 gems when you complete that ONE daily objective that gives you them, just watch the dumb ads. The fights are slow and you'll feel like you just wasted your life when you lose one. Some dino designs are cool, but others just look too similar. 3/5
Amazing game but kept crashing when I get free chests. Now the game won't load. Please fix this I have a lot of 5 star creatures and I don't want to restart.

Its so nice I like evolving this dinos because it's so nice other dinos when you evolve dinos is so fun other dinos is so huge!!!üòÅüòÉ I enjoy this game!!!!!!!! Please rate this 5 stars if you dowload this game!!!!! Please!

title: Water Intake Tracking
description:
Drinking water regularly with today's busy lifestyle is a big challenge. Who drinks enough water every day? Water Health will help you by calculating how much water you need, tracking when you drink, and smartly reminding you when to drink. It is your time to use the power of technology to improve your health.

The benefits of drinking water are huge: weight loss, improved skin, better hair, healthier organs, higher energy level, headache relief, and more.

Water Health will make sure you are drinking enough water to stay healthy! Track your recommended water intake based off weight, weather, and activity level.

Features
‚úî Automatic notifications to inform you when you are behind schedule
‚úî Custom cup sizes in oz or ml units
‚úî Graph your water intake by week or month
‚úî Browse your logs to view drinking schedule and hydration level over time

recentChanges:
- Bug fixes and performance improvements

Please let us know if we can do anything else to make the app better for you!
comments: I like this app. I wanted to keep track of my water intake and this is perfect for me. The only downside is the ads but it's not super in your face about it. So I would recommend using this app, if you want to keep track of your water intake.

I like how you can tweak its settings. I just don't agree to the computation of water requirements daily because my formula is 50ml x kg = total required water per day. But I still thank you for creating the app because it helps me monitor my water intake progress.

Water health is an awesome tool for me to take care of my water intake on daily basis. I recommended the same to all of my family members. Most of them will be onboard soon too. The best part is the reminders and current status of daily water intake. Very useful for people suffering from Kidney stones.
It's to use a helpful. I like how I am able to keep track and know how much I am drinking every day.
Simple and easy to use. Perfect for making sure you are drinking enough water daily. It bases your intake goal on weight, activity, and weather/temp. or you can set you own goals as well.

title: Aquavias ‚Äì Water Flow Puzzle
description:
Aquavias is a puzzle game of increasing difficulty in which each level is a challenging game of logic and intelligence that will hook you.

Train your mind, solve the different puzzles by making the water flow from its origin to  cities and grandiose buildings

Aquavias contains 100 levels

The game is suitable for kids, adults, fans of block puzzles and jigsaws, plumber and water pipes games to train your brain and logic.

- 100 free puzzles
- Boards of different sizes and difficulty.

Download it now and start having fun!

comments: [spoilers warning] I truly enjoyed this game's challenges. I didn't give this five stars only for the fact the "story" needs embraced.... the ending of each level should be celebrated (the beauty of the fruits of your labor is masked) ... and the last level ends with ______ (?... alll that work for a few ponds? (and the arrow at the end implies there are more "chapters", are there more?)... I really encourage you to celebrate wins (Monument Valley, for example)!...OTHERWISE, WOW! üôÉü§ì

I managed to play until map 4 before uninstalling, just not my kind of game I guess. Beautiful graphics and soundtrack, relaxing atmosphere, reasonable amount of ads though the banner ads bothers me so much since I can't close it (and it kinda ruined the atmosphere and graphics for me) because it's too close to my phone's screen edge.

Im enjoying this puzzle game immensely! The graphics are beautiful, the music is peaceful and the water effects is so soothing, i wish there is a soundtrack for download so i can sleep to it. I like that there are 2 kinds of level, the timed one and number of moves! Nicely done!!

One of the best game I've seen lately! It's simple, but eye-catching game you are looking for if you want to kill some time and relax. Of course I donated, no doubt it was worth it. Visuals: 10/10 Music: 10/10 (K-Pax inspired) Gameplay: 10/10
Calm and peaceful with a soothing music. Playing this game is like meditation. Loved it. Pay what you want for Removing Ad is a very nice gesture. Thanks to the developers.

title: Brain Game - Water Plant
description:
* There are no full-size ads that bother you!
* All levels are free to enjoy!

The 'Water Plant'  is a a brain game that connects pipes to build up water networks.
Rotate pipes to supply water from the water source to flowers and trees.
Train your brain and improve judgment with this simple puzzle game.

- How to play the 'Water Plant' game?
Rotate pipes, water resource, flower and tree symbols, and supply water to all pipes and plants symbols. Once water is supplied, the pipe and plant icons will change to 'blue' color. 

Please keep in mind only one rule.
Once all pipes and plants are in the "flowing" state (blue), you can move on to the next level.

- Leaderboard
Check your rankings with other players around the world.

----------
If you are willing to support coffee for the development team, please use the advertisement removal feature in this game.

If you have any questions or bug reports, please e-mail us.
We also welcome comments on translations. 
Thank you.

mars.crews@gmail.com

title: Water live wallpaper
description:
Water live wallpaper, simulates liquid water ripple effect.
Adds water drops on your screen!

Now with custom backgound image!
 
If you like this wallpaper, please support us by purchasing Pro version with more features.
https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.xllusion.livewallpaper.waterpro
 
Features
- Fluid like, water ripple effects
- Setting widget (Pro version)
- Custom background image (Pro version)
- Water drop settings (Pro version)
- Use 3D hardware to render images, save battery
- Support most resolutions including Android tablet
- Android 4.0 ICS ready

Instruction
Home -> Menu -> Wallpapers -> Live Wallpapers

Note: It is live wallpaper so you can't open the app, you will need to follow the instruction above in order to set the wallpaper. 

If you have put the app on SD card and restarted the phone, the wallpaper will reset to default since the system couldn't find the app first. 

FAQ:
1. Why is there "Internet access" permission?
It is for ads on setting screen only, nothing else. Pro version is ads free with more features.

2. Wallpaper resets to default after reboot/restart the phone?
Please move the app to phone instead of SD card.
