title: Drink Water: Water Intake Tracker and Reminder
description:
Drinking sufficient water is one of the most important step towards staying fit and healthy.

Key benefits include-
- Detoxifying your body
- Keep your skin clean and full of moisture
- Prevents kidney stones
- Helps in metabolism
- Keep your body in shape
- It has zero calories

Despite so many benefits, due to our busy lives, we often forget drinking ample water or drinking water at regular interval. This is where drink water app comes into picture. This simple app helps you stay hydrated by reminding you to drink water.

Calculate Daily Water Requirement
Using the drink water app, you can calculate the daily required water intake for you. The app also gives you flexibility to change this target. In other words, on a hot day or after working out, you can increase your water target. This is the starting point to your water diet and it's benefits.

Log Water
Every time you drink water, you can easily log it in the app. This helps you keep a track of how much water you are drinking throughout the day. You can even log water for previous days (in case you missed out on logging them in). Each time you log water, the app will tell you how close you've moved to meeting your daily target.

Unlock Achievements
The app rewards you for staying hydrated. Keep yourself motivated towards leading a healthy lifestyle by unlocking different achievements. You can even share them and brag about them with friends and family. This helps you make process and reach milestones in a playful manner.

Monitor and Track
The app stores historical data of every time you logged in water. This helps you keep a track of how hydrated you have been over a longer period of time. You can monitor the data on a beautiful calendar. The calendar also highlights the dates on which you met your daily targets. This gives you a realistic insight into how long have you been maintaining a healthy lifestyle.

Water Drinking Reminder
"The app sends you notification to remind you to have some water throughout the day. This helps you to keep drinking water at regular intervals even on a busy day.

No notifications are sent at night. The app is completely customisable. You also have the option to diable or re-enable the drink water notifications at will."

Support Across Units
The app supports both metric and imperial units. Based on the country you live in and your preferences, you can set the unit. This setting can be changed later on as well.

Custom Cup Size
You can choose from different cup sizes available on the app or even define your own. Every small bit counts on your journey towards a healthier and hydrated you. It is not just limited to water. This allows you to track other drinks like tea/coffee as well.

Secure App
This is a secure app. We are constantly trying to improve the app. We would love to hear your opinion and feedback. Kindly share the same through the app.

Drinking water at regular intervals is an extremely good habit but difficult to maintain. With drink water app on your side, this becomes easier. 

Dehydration is the deficit of water in your body. It affects your metabolism, digestion and general health. It can even speed up the formation of kidney stones.

It's time to start drinking water!

What a fantastic app to track my water levels. I am a person who ignores drinking water and gets into dehydration mode quite often leading to some nasty dehydration symptoms. This app gives me a sense of motivation to drink water all the timeüôÇüôÇ and that is a good thing. I personally found this app very seamless and bug free. So would i recommend this to all my loved ones ? Hell Yes !!! Nice job guys !!

Fabulously crafted app!! Simple, yet effective. Like a lot of people, I forget to drink enough water on day to day basis. This app has helped me to make sure that I don't compromise on at least one front when it comes to health, that is, my water intake. Thanks guys for that. It's almost a gift for people like me.Bravo!

Love this app!! Does what it say's rather effectively. Timely reminders have been helping me to keep track of my water intake & stay hydrated, the UI is slick. There are tons of similar apps out there but I found this one to be the best as it's nearly ad-free and very lightweight, meaning uses very fewer resources like RAM and storage. The cherry on top is the 'gamification' or milestones feature which keeps you motivated. Also noteworthy, is the custom cup sizes which help you record your intake in just one click.

I am loving this app. The reminders are helpful & I enjoy the little water drop character cheering me on lol (it's the simple things) if I had to make a suggestion it would be having the presets stay on the page instead of having to change the setting everytime. I go between cups of tea and various sizes of bottled waters so I'm constantly changing the settings. Also, I'd like to be able to keep track of what kind of water I'm drinking i.e. Propel, Essentia, Yogi tea.... other than that.. I love!

title: Floating Water -Coach Duty 3D
description:
Floating Water -Coach Duty 3D

Floating Water -Coach Duty 3D is for those who are fan of ship games like boat, yacht or sailboat? Get thrilling experience of boat racing on water in your car and think of being in the next century. Drive your coach like a boat in deep sea and experience the thrill of water sports. Be a ship captain and drive your bus like a water jet and enjoy thrilling jet boat racing and be the champion.
Enjoy your yacht racing drive through deep sea. Run your water coach bus to get people enjoy on beach. Visitors are there; help them to spend their quality time. You are the captain of your yacht i-e water coach bus. Make a newer drive and bus ride fun. Here only you are the best driver on the island who can drive and surf on seawater.
People are amazed and crazy to get this water surfer bus ride. 
Have you ever ride water motorbike or Jet Ski? Maybe yes, but its absolutely different experience to float your coach over the deep-sea water and splash it all around. You will have to ride across the flags in stunning levels of this game using your Jet Ski riding skills to unlock other levels. You‚Äôll drive your water coach over beach sand and water. Struggle to retain control and reach the finish line in specific time; your task starts from picking passengers and drop them to their location on the island. This engine powered boat racer will give you the real experience of controlling a water vehicle in water and a land vehicle on sand.
FREE download to enjoy real Jet Ski wave runner.
